empire_base.zhcn_modifier: 最大宿敌数量：§G+3§!\n最大占领军：§G+3§!\n贸易保护：§G+2§!

playable_ai_empire.zhcn_modifier: 外交影响力花费：§G-50%§!\n考古发掘速度：§R-50%§!

empire_size_over_cap.zhcn_modifier: 运动花费：§R+1%§!\n领袖维护费：§R+1%§!\n领袖花费：§R+1%§!

empire_size.zhcn_desc: §E§H帝国规模§!是量化衡量帝国所控制的领土，包括§H恒星系§!、§H殖民地§!、以及§H区划§!在内的总体指标。§H帝国规模§!过大会对帝国的行政效率产生负面影响，从而增加§H科技§!、§H传统§!、§H领袖§!、§H法令§!以及§H运动§!的花费。§!
empire_size.en_desc: §E§HEmpire Sprawl§! is a measure of the territorial expanse of your empire in the form of controlled §HSystems§!, §HColonies§! and §HDistricts§!. A high §HEmpire Sprawl§! is a strain on your empire's administrative capacity, and will increase the cost of §HTechnologies§!, §HTraditions§!, §HLeaders§!, §HEdicts§! and §HCampaigns§!.§!

navy_size.zhcn_desc: §E超过你的§H海军容量§!将会导致你的舰队维护成本增加。§H海军容量§!会根据§H人口§!和§H恒星基地锚地§!的数量增加而提升，也会受§H科技§!和§H传统§!影响。§!
navy_size.en_desc: §EExceeding your §HNaval Capacity§! will cause your ships to have an increased upkeep cost. The §HNaval Capacity§! is increased by your number of §HPops§! and §HStarbase Anchorages§!, and also by certain §HTechnologies§! and §HTraditions§!.§!

infiltration_happiness.zhcn_desc: 这个行星上的居民正在庆祝他们融入了一个更加先进的文明。
infiltration_happiness.en_desc: The people of this planet are celebrating their integration into a more advanced civilization.

branch_office_value.zhcn_desc: §E分部价值是在此设立§Y分部§!可获得的基础£energy£§Y能量币§!收入，并受到星球的总£trade_value£§Y贸易额§!影响。§!
branch_office_value.en_desc: §EBranch Office Value is the base amount of £energy£ §YEnergy Credits§! income that can be gained from establishing a §YBranch Office§! here, and is determined by the total £trade_value£§YTrade Value§! of the planet.§!

pop_angry_subterranean.zhcn_desc: 无法对造成破坏性地震的地底异种采取行动，这样的无能让人怒火中烧。
pop_angry_subterranean.en_desc: Angry at the failure to confront the subterranean aliens on this world about the destructive earthquakes they are causing.

pop_drought.en_desc: Suffering from a distinct lack of moisture.

pop_did_not_kill_stalker.zhcn_name: 试图击杀突变体时失败了

hazardous_weather.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上充斥着难以估计的天气变化，经常突然地出现猛烈的风暴，在地表造成浩劫。
hazardous_weather.en_desc: This world suffers from unstable weather patterns, with violent storms frequently appearing out of nowhere to wreak havoc on the surface.
hazardous_weather.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§R-10%§!
幸福度：§R-5%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+20%§!
发电区划最大建造数量：§G+4§!

dangerous_wildlife.zhcn_desc: 这个星球现在塞满了想要闹事的动物，随时准备将任何在行星表面活动的生物变成他们的午饭，但同时，它们的生物行为也能够提供繁多的科研机会。
dangerous_wildlife.en_desc: This world has evolved extremely Hostile Fauna, and the surface is rife with lethal predators waiting to ambush their next meal. Their biology offers great research opportunities, however.
dangerous_wildlife.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-10%§!\n幸福度：§R-5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!

weak_magnetic_field.zhcn_desc: 尽管可以居住，但这个星球上极弱甚至不存在的磁场使得来自宇宙的辐射如入无人之境。
weak_magnetic_field.en_desc: Although habitable, this world has a weak or non-existent magnetic field that offers little protection against cosmic radiation.

strong_magnetic_field.zhcn_desc: 这个星球有异常强大的磁场。这将对我们的各项仪器造成影响。
strong_magnetic_field.en_desc: This planet has an abnormally high magnetic field. This will interfere with many of our instruments and computers.
strong_magnetic_field.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+5%§!\n发电区划最大建造数量：§G+2§!

unstable_tectonics.zhcn_desc: 这个星球拥有非常不稳定的板块构造，容易出现大规模地震和火山爆发。
unstable_tectonics.en_desc: This world has very unstable plate tectonics and is prone to massive earthquakes and volcanic activity.
unstable_tectonics.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-10%§!\n幸福度：§R-5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+20%§!

tidal_locked.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被其环绕的恒星锁定，这代表着它将不能进行自转，星球的两边分别是永恒的光明与永恒的黑暗，如果这个世界真的存在着生物，那么就只能出现在两边的交界线上。
tidal_locked.en_desc: This world is tidally locked around its star, meaning that one side always has daylight while the other is locked in eternal darkness. If life exists here, it is likely limited to the twilight regions where the two sides meet.

chthonian_planet.zhcn_desc: 这个星球曾是一个气态巨行星，但因为过于接近恒星，其大气层被烧毁殆尽，只留下了一个密度密度，矿产丰富的星核。
chthonian_planet.en_desc: This planet was once a gas giant, but its proximity to its star has burned away the thick atmosphere. All that remains now is a super-dense and mineral rich metallic core.

asteroid_impacts.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的轨道上散落着数目繁多的小行星，流星和彗星群，并经常撞击其表面。
asteroid_impacts.en_desc: The orbital path this world takes around its star is littered with small asteroids, meteors, and comet swarms. Large impacts on the surface occur at an alarming frequency.
asteroid_impacts.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-5%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+5%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+2§!

extensive_moon_system.zhcn_desc: 这个气态巨行星拥有非比寻常多的天然卫星，轨道上充斥着数以百计的小卫星。
extensive_moon_system.en_desc: This gas giant has an unusually large amount of natural satellites. Hundreds of small moons and moonlets orbit the planet.
extensive_moon_system.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+10%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+2§!

carbon_world.zhcn_desc: 这个星球大部分由碳组成，含氧量极少。
carbon_world.en_desc: This world has been formed mostly out of carbon, and contains little oxygen.

wild_storms.zhcn_desc: 激烈的电子流风暴以难以预料的频率不断侵袭着这个星球的大气层。
wild_storms.en_desc: Spectacular electrical storms wrack this planet's atmosphere on a semi-regular basis.
wild_storms.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-5%§!\n幸福度：§R-5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+20%§!

mineral_rich.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星地壳蕴藏的丰富高品质矿藏使采矿在这里成为一项获利颇丰的事业。
mineral_rich.en_desc: An abundance of high quality minerals in this planet's crust makes mining here a lucrative business.
mineral_rich.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+15%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+4§!

ultra_rich.zhcn_desc: 这个星球简直就是一个宝库！超高品质的矿物无疑是一个惊人的利润来源。
ultra_rich.en_desc: The exceptional quality of the minerals in this planet's crust provides a truly staggering opportunity for mining.
ultra_rich.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+25%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+8§!

mineral_poor.zhcn_desc: 人们至今仍不清楚这颗行星究竟是生来如此，亦或是某种未知物种曾经到来将它的许多珍贵资源攫取一空。无论怎样，我们清楚的是这颗行星现在的矿物质量异常低劣。
mineral_poor.en_desc: It is unknown if this planet simply formed this way, or if some unknown race once stripped it of its more valuable resources. However, we do know that the minerals present on this planet are of unusually poor quality.
mineral_poor.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§R-25%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§R-3§!

titanic_life.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的生命体有着异常庞大的体型，即便它们本身没有恶意，其存在也是相当危险的。
titanic_life.en_desc: The lifeforms of this planet are built on a massive scale and can be incredibly dangerous even without meaning any harm.
titanic_life.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+25%§!

eat_the_titans.zhcn_desc: 出乎意料的，在收集这些巨兽用作科研的过程中，我们发现这些东西口感相当美味！
eat_the_titans.en_desc: Harvesting the Titanic life for research data has had an unexpected side benefit: They taste great!
eat_the_titans.zhcn_modifier: 农业区划最大建造数量：§G+8§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§G+30%§!

asteroid_belt.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星的某个卫星可能是因一场灾难而被毁灭，也有可能这本身就是一堆轨道碎片。不管是什么原因导致的，这颗行星如今被一条小行星带环绕着。
asteroid_belt.en_desc: Perhaps this planet once had a moon which was destroyed in some calamity, or perhaps its orbital debris never fully coalesced in the first place. Whatever the cause, this planet is surrounded by a belt of small asteroids.
asteroid_belt.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+10%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+3§!

natural_beauty.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星上的景色处处秀丽，行星上的居民总会持续不断地寻找到新的自然奇迹。
natural_beauty.en_desc: The scenery on this planet is simply beautiful, anyone living on this planet will be constantly finding new wonders to behold.

atmospheric_aphrodisiac.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的大气层中蕴含着的物质使当地人变得，唔，精力旺盛。
atmospheric_aphrodisiac.en_desc: Something in the air of this planet seems to put people in the mood to reproduce.
atmospheric_aphrodisiac.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§G+5%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+10%§!\n主流思潮吸引力：§R-20%§!

atmospheric_hallucinogen.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的空气里似乎含有某种天然的致幻剂。它确实能使人心情愉悦，也似乎能让某些物理学之谜变得易解；可同时也会让人无法集中精力。
atmospheric_hallucinogen.en_desc: The air of this planet contains a natural hallucinogen. While this does keep people happy, and indeed seems to aid the visualization of some of the more esoteric Physics problems, it also distracts people from other work.
atmospheric_hallucinogen.zhcn_modifier: 有机人口幸福度：§G+5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!\n主流思潮吸引力：§R-30%§!

atmospheric_hallucinogen_good.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的空气里曾含有某种天然致幻剂。而如今经过过滤后致幻物质已被稀释。尽管少了一些原本的好处，但同时也消除了所有的负面影响。
atmospheric_hallucinogen_good.en_desc: The air of this planet once contained a natural hallucinogen. Now, with the aid of massive filters, the effect has been diluted. This has reduced the benefits it once gave, but has also eliminated the negatives.
atmospheric_hallucinogen_good.zhcn_modifier: 幸福度：§G+10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!

lush_planet.zhcn_desc: 生命在这个星球上蓬勃发展，动植物种类繁多，且生长迅速而繁盛。
lush_planet.en_desc: Life thrives here, the fauna is plentiful and the flora grows rapidly.
lush_planet.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§G+10%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§G+20%§!\n农业区划最大建造数量：§G+4§!

bleak_planet.zhcn_desc: 生物难以在这里生存，尽管有些物种顽强地寓居于此，它们也都瘦小而虚弱。
bleak_planet.en_desc: Life struggles to survive here, and while some clings to a tenacious existence it is anemic and sickly.
bleak_planet.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-5%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-10%§!\n农业区划最大建造数量：§R-2§!

irradiated_planet.zhcn_desc: 一场很久以前的灾难让这颗星球笼罩在严重的辐射之中。
irradiated_planet.en_desc: Some long-ago calamity rendered this planet rather heavily irradiated.
irradiated_planet.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§R-10%§!
有机人口幸福度：§R-20%§!
£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-50%§!
农业区划最大建造数量：§R-6§!
采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+2§!

low_gravity.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星有着异常低的密度，因此重力也比其他相同体积的星球低许多。
low_gravity.en_desc: This planet has an unusually low density and therefore much lower gravity than most planets of comparable size.

high_gravity.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星有着异常高的密度，因此形成了令人难受的强重力。
high_gravity.en_desc: This planet is unusually dense and so has uncomfortably high gravity.
high_gravity.zhcn_modifier:
建筑花费：§R+10%§!
区划花费：§R+10%§!
宜居性：§R-5%§!
最大区划数：§G+2§!

migrating_forests.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的林木时不时地迁移到新的区域，给道路，能源路线和其他基础建设的建造带来了极大的干扰。
migrating_forests.en_desc: The mobile forests of this world frequently migrate en masse to new regions, disrupting efforts at building roads, power lines and other infrastructure.

migrating_forests_2.zhcn_desc: §W添加§Y迁徙森林保护区§!修正，提升该星球上的£society£ §Y社会学研究§!。§!\n\n该星球的迁徙森林现在会隔离在居民区之外，也不会再对殖民地造成损害了，但其存在仍然会限制殖民者可用的土地规模。
migrating_forests_2.en_desc: §W§YMigrating Forest Reserve§! added, improving £society£ §YSociety Research§! on the planet.§!\n\nThe wandering forests on this world now avoid populated areas and no longer cause damage to settlements. Their presence still limits the amount of free land available to colonists.

dead_creatures.zhcn_desc: 这个巨型气态行星是一个古代太空生物的墓地，我们能够研究它们的尸体来获得有价值的资讯。
dead_creatures.en_desc: This gas giant served as an ancient graveyard for a species of spacefaring creatures. Many corpses can still be found in orbit, offering valuable research.

starship_graveyard.zhcn_desc: 数千年前这颗星球的轨道上发生过一场大战，如今这里还有七零八落的古代飞船残骸。对它们的舰船设计进行研究，可以获得宝贵的知识成果。
starship_graveyard.en_desc: A great battle took place in orbit of this world millennia ago, and the surface is still littered with the wreckage of ancient starships. Studying their advanced designs will yield valuable knowledge.

organic_starship.zhcn_desc: 三十多亿年前某艘具有生命的飞船在这颗星球坠毁。尽管现在只剩下骸骨，但仍然是很宝贵的研究材料。
organic_starship.en_desc: Some sort of organic starship crashed on this world more than three billion years ago. Though only its ancient bones remain, the site offers a wealth of research opportunities.

abandoned_cities.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的原始居民已经神秘消失，留下他们几乎完好无缺的城市和基础设施。这将使它更容易发展成为新的殖民地。
abandoned_cities.en_desc: The original inhabitants of this world have mysteriously vanished, leaving behind their cities and infrastructure almost intact. This will make it much easier for a potential colony to develop.

subterranean_ocean.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的冰质幔层下有一大片海洋，海底热泉为这片海洋提供着热量。深海中有大量生物存在，对这些有机物进行研究我们必能收获颇丰。
subterranean_ocean.en_desc: There is a large ocean heated by hydrothermal vents hidden beneath the ice mantle of this world. It is teeming with life, and much can be learned by studying these unique organisms.

colony_enclaves.zhcn_desc: 星球上殖民者的活动范围将会被限制在指定的强化飞地中，而余下的土地将会让当地的石器时代土著和平地居住。
colony_enclaves.en_desc: The colony on this world is limited to several fortified enclaves. An indigenous Stone Age proto-civilization has been left in peace to develop independently on the remaining land.

primitive_reservation.zhcn_desc: 外星殖民将这颗星球的一部分土地隔绝开来，留给本土的石器文明使用。这也在一定程度上限制了殖民者的土地和资源利用。
primitive_reservation.en_desc: A part of this world has been turned into an enclosed reservation for an indigenous Stone Age proto-civilization. This has somewhat limited the land and resources available to colonists.

atmospheric_ecosystem.zhcn_desc: 这个气态巨行星的上方大气层是重要的生态系统，许多外星生物在此栖居。这种有趣的生物体系值得我们去进行研究。
atmospheric_ecosystem.en_desc: The upper atmosphere of this gas giant features a significant ecosystem that is home to many strange alien life forms. Their interesting biology is a promising research subject.

asteroid_life.zhcn_desc: 这个小行星是一个大型石化蠕虫的洞穴家园，我们可以通过研究这一独特的生命模式获得许多有价值的资讯。
asteroid_life.en_desc: This asteroid is home to a colony of large worm-like lithovores that burrow through the rock. Much could be learned by studying these unique life forms.

asteroid_coprolite.zhcn_desc: 这颗小行星实际上是一个巨大的粪化石——某种巨大生命的古老化石排泄物。
asteroid_coprolite.en_desc: This asteroid is actually a gigantic coprolite - an ancient piece of fossilized feces from some kind of massive lifeform.

derelict_shipyard.zhcn_desc: 曾经有一个大型船厂在这个小行星内，珍贵的文物已经不知所踪，但遗留下来的建筑依然是工程界的奇迹。
derelict_shipyard.en_desc: A large shipyard was built in the interior of this asteroid eons ago. It has been stripped of valuable artifacts, but remains a marvel of engineering.

junkyard.zhcn_desc: 这个小行星曾是一个垃圾场，其表面遍布金属残骸。当中仍有一些具打捞价值的废品。
junkyard.en_desc: This asteroid served as a junkyard at some point and the surface is covered in metallic debris. Some of it can still be salvaged.

target_range.zhcn_desc: 这个可怜的小行星曾经被用作为亚空间武器测试目标物，其表面依然有异常的能量反应留存。
target_range.en_desc: Someone used this poor asteroid as a target to test subspace weapons among other things. Anomalous energy echoes still linger on the surface.

ore_freighter.zhcn_desc: 数千年前曾有一艘巨型矿石运输船在这个小行星上坠毁，货舱里的物品现在依然散落在小行星表面上。
ore_freighter.en_desc: A massive superfreighter carrying ore crashed on this asteroid thousands of years ago, and the contents of its cargo bays can still be found scattered on the surface.

aerostat_colonies.zhcn_desc: 在这个气态巨行星的低轨道上仍然能找到古代的浮空殖民地的废墟。其异常坚固的设计是先进工程的产物。
aerostat_colonies.en_desc: A crumbing network of ancient aerostat colonies can still be found in low orbit of this gas giant. Their unusually sturdy design is the product of advanced engineering.

debris_field.zhcn_desc: 一堆太空残骸被这个巨型气态行星的强大重力井所捕获，虽然大部份都是些废品，但内含的金属可以进行回收加以运用。
debris_field.en_desc: A dense layer of space debris has been captured by the strong gravity well of this gas giant. Most of it is worthless, but the metal can be recycled.

extreme_storms.zhcn_desc: 数之不尽的巨型风暴在这个气态巨行星上肆虐，我们无法透过气候模型来解释这个情况，显然这是一个有价值的研究对像。
extreme_storms.en_desc: Dozens of massive storms are raging in the atmosphere of this gas giant. Climate models have failed to explain their presence, making the planet an interesting subject of research.

precious_moon.zhcn_desc: 环绕这颗气态巨行星的庞大天然卫星系统中有一颗富含贵重金属和矿物的小卫星。
precious_moon.en_desc: A small moonlet largely consisting of precious metals and minerals can be found within the extensive system of natural satellites that orbit this gas giant.

asteroid_collision.zhcn_desc: 不到一千年以前，一颗大质量的小行星撞击了这个星球，大量矿物沉积于此。
asteroid_collision.en_desc: A massive asteroid impacted this world less than a thousand years ago, depositing a large amount of minerals.

microsingularity.zhcn_desc: 曾有一个微型奇点干净俐落的穿过这个星球的核心，并留下了一些有趣的能量残留。
microsingularity.en_desc: A microsingularity passed clean through the core of this world, causing some interesting energy emissions.

alien_writing.zhcn_desc: 有人曾利用采矿激光在这个世界表面刻上一些即使在轨道上仍能看到的文字。
alien_writing.en_desc: Someone has carved a large body of text into the surface of this world with a mining laser. The alien letters are large enough to be visible from orbit.

towed_asteroid.zhcn_desc: 有人将这颗巨大的小行星牵引到这个星球的稳定轨道上，或许是为了开采以获得资源。
towed_asteroid.en_desc: Someone has towed a large asteroid into a stable orbit around this world, presumably to mine it for resources.

nuclear_devastation.zhcn_desc: 这个星球曾经历过一次由土著发起的毁灭性世界大战，最终形成有毒的大气层，我们能够透过研究这些死寂废墟来获得有价值的研究资料。
nuclear_devastation.en_desc: The toxic atmosphere of this world is the result of a destructive global war fought between factions of an indigenous civilization. Valuable research can be done by studying the lifeless ruins.

gamma_ray.zhcn_desc: 很久以前，这个星球处于恒星坍缩時引起的伽马射线曝晒下，它的臭氧层至今还没有完全恢复，這意味着所有殖民者都要采取额外的紫外线保护措施。
gamma_ray.en_desc: Long ago, this world was in the path of a gamma-ray burst from a collapsing star. The ozone layer has yet to fully recover, meaning that any potential colonists will need extra protection against UV radiation.

greenhouse_effect.zhcn_desc: 这个星球受到当地处于工业时代的土著无节制产生的温室气体所污染，并引发了温室气体失控，一些古代工厂和居住地区的无人废墟在有毒的大气层下仍然清晰可见。
greenhouse_effect.en_desc: An indigenous industrial civilization polluted this world to the point where a runaway greenhouse effect was triggered. The lifeless ruins of ancient factories and population centers can still be found on the toxic surface.

ammonia_biosphere.zhcn_desc: 这个有毒的星球拥有一种使用氨而非水份为溶剂的生物圈，研究这一种氨基生物将会对我们的生物学带来长足的发展。
ammonia_biosphere.en_desc: This toxic world is home to a rare ecology where life uses ammonia instead of water as a solvent. These ammonia-based life forms have developed in unique ways, and studying them would advance our understanding of biology.

silicon_lifeforms.zhcn_desc: 穴居的半智能硅基生命形式生活在这个星球地表下的大型隧道网络中。它们时常能将挖掘到的贵重金属和矿物带到地表来。
silicon_lifeforms.en_desc: Burrowing, semi-intelligent life forms made out of silicon inhabit a large tunnel network beneath the surface of this world. Their digging efforts frequently shuffles valuable metals and minerals to the surface.

colony_ruins.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上有一个属于未知的星际帝国的古老殖民地遗迹。
colony_ruins.en_desc: Ancient ruins from a small abandoned colony belonging to an unknown interstellar empire can be found on this world.

alien_mural.zhcn_desc: 这个星球表面上的一副古老壁画记载了一个早已消亡的外星文明掌握的技术知识。
alien_mural.en_desc: An ancient mural on the surface of this world recounts the technological knowledge of a long-dead alien civilization.

damaged_ecology.zhcn_desc: 该星球的迁徙林木遭到人为破坏，将对生态造成显著影响。
damaged_ecology.en_desc: The destruction of the wandering forests on this world has had a significant effect on the ecology.

friendly_trees.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的森林与殖民者互相接纳了对方，这使他们的精神振奋了一段时日。
friendly_trees.en_desc: The forests and colonists on this world have adapted to each other, raising spirits for a time.

subterranean_civilization.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的地下外星文明与地表上的殖民者拥有良好关系，双方经常从事贸易和文化交流。
subterranean_civilization.en_desc: The subterranean alien civilization on this world enjoys a good relationship with the colonists on the surface, and both parties frequently engage in trade and cultural exchanges.
subterranean_civilization.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!

subterranean_expansion.zhcn_desc: 曾经生活在这个世界上的地下土著文明已经灭绝了，殖民者现在能够自由扩展到他们废弃的地下城市。
subterranean_expansion.en_desc: The indigenous subterranean civilization that once lived on this world has been exterminated, and colonists are now free to expand into their abandoned underground cities.

gas_giant_civ.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球是达斯纳克的首都和母星。这些气态生物的工程和科研技术十分落后，但我们可以从他们当中学到很多社会科学。
gas_giant_civ.en_desc: This world is the new capital and adopted homeworld of the Dathnak. These sapient gaseous beings have no industry or technology, but they appear to be quite social.

gas_giant_colony.zhcn_desc: 被称为达斯纳克的智慧生命形式在这颗气态巨行星上建立了一个小型殖民地。
gas_giant_colony.en_desc: The sapient gaseous life forms known as the Dathnak have established a small colony within the atmosphere of this gas giant.

abandoned_terraforming.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球在几千年前曾被试图进行地表改造，但基于不明原因，这一进程被打断，并导致了星球内的气候系统和生物圈极其不稳定。
abandoned_terraforming.en_desc: This world was partly terraformed thousands of years ago, but the process was interrupted for unknown reasons. The result is a highly unstable climate system and biosphere.
abandoned_terraforming.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-20%§!\n幸福度：§R-10%§!

gaia_world.zhcn_desc: 古代环境改造技术将这个星球改造为一个郁郁葱葱的天堂。
gaia_world.en_desc: Ancient terraforming techniques have turned this world into a lush paradise.

mutant_stalker.zhcn_desc: 一个突变的生命体正在猎杀这个星球上的殖民者，邻里乡间人心惶惶。我们的殖民地的发展受到影响，工人都不愿意冒险进入荒野。
mutant_stalker.en_desc: A mutated creature is hunting the colonists on this world, spreading terror in the countryside. The development of our colony has been impacted, as workers are reluctant to venture into the wilderness.

wasteland_infrastructure.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的原居民在一场使用核武的战争中自我毁灭，但仍有大量的基础设施得以保留。这将为我们建立新设施提供帮助。
wasteland_infrastructure.en_desc: There is still a significant amount of infrastructure left on this world, built by its original inhabitants before they destroyed themselves in a nuclear war. This will aid in the construction of new buildings.

wasteland_radiation.zhcn_desc: 数个定居点附近的大量辐照为当地殖民者带来严重的负面影响。
wasteland_radiation.en_desc: High levels of radiation near several settlements are having an adverse effect on the health of the colonists living there.

wasteland_orbital_debris.zhcn_desc: 在这个星球上的轨道上充斥着残骸。不仅无法送地表发射卫星，而且残骸密集区也令导航难以进行，这严重阻碍了殖民地的基础建设。
wasteland_orbital_debris.en_desc: The orbital space over this world is littered with debris. Satellites cannot be launched from the surface, and the dense field has become a navigational hazard. This is seriously hampering the development of the colony's infrastructure.

upliftable_species.zhcn_desc: 这里有可被提升的物种，假如我们在这个星球上建立殖民地，那么我们就不再会去提升它们。
upliftable_species.en_desc: There are species here which can be uplifted, creating a colony on this planet would remove our option to uplift them.

assist_research.zhcn_desc: 科研船在轨道上支援行星表面上的科研机构。
assist_research.en_desc: Planetside research facilities are assisted by a Science Ship in orbit.
assist_research.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+10%§!

ancient_automation.zhcn_desc: 尽管历史悠久，但星球上的机器仍为我们的生产工作提供了良好的帮助。
ancient_automation.en_desc: Ancient, yet helpful, machines aid our production on this planet.

ancient_factory.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星上的一座古代工厂仍然可以运作。
ancient_factory.en_desc: An ancient factory on this planet is still in operation condition.

robot_workers.zhcn_desc: 由某个遗落文明所制造的机器人劳工仍留存在这颗行星上。在采取适当的防范措施后，这些机器人就能为我们效命了。
robot_workers.en_desc: Robot workers from a forgotten civilization remain on this planet. With the proper precautions, they could be put to work for us.

ancient_forgeworld.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星原本是某个遗落文明的工业制造中心。尽管只有一小部分仪器仍然能运行，但也为我们的工业作出了很好的示范。
ancient_forgeworld.en_desc: This planet was once some kind of center of production for a forgotten civilization. Although only a shadow of its former capacity remains in working condition, it is still an impressive example of industry.

ancient_weapon.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的原文明种群似乎在其轨道上建造了某种巨型武器。尽管无法使用且看上去也是尚未完成的状态，不过通过研究它我们还是可以学到一些东西。
ancient_weapon.en_desc: It seems that some long-forgotten race once build some kind of huge weapon in orbit above this world. While it doesn't work, indeed it doesn't appear to have been completed, we can likely learn a few things by studying it.

holy_planet.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星被邻近的失落帝国视为圣地，假如我们在其之上殖民，将会大大的触怒失落帝国。
holy_planet.en_desc: This planet is considered sacred by a nearby Fallen Empire. Colonizing it will anger them greatly.

terraforming_candidate.zhcn_desc: 尽管表面荒芜贫瘠毫无生机，这颗星球上仍存在有以冻结形态存在的水，这里也许曾经孕育过一个生机勃勃的生态系统。如果利用合适的科技加以环境改造，这里可能成为一个宜居的世界。
terraforming_candidate.en_desc: Though barren and devoid of life, this planet has water in frozen form and may once have been home to a thriving ecosystem. With the right technology, it could be terraformed into a habitable world.

planet_uncertain_past.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的居民一致对许久之前发生的一场灾难耿耿于怀，现在正在试图找出真正的原因。
planet_uncertain_past.en_desc: The people of this planet are troubled by not knowing what caused the disaster which befell it long ago, and are driven to try to find out.
planet_uncertain_past.zhcn_modifier:
来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+10%§!
幸福度：§R-15%§!

recent_quake.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星近期一直受到强烈的地质运动影响。
recent_quake.en_desc: This planet was recently rocked by a violent Tectonic Event

recent_comet.zhcn_desc: 一颗彗星最近在这颗星球的小行星带中穿过，人们在地表上就能用肉眼看见这壮观的景象！
recent_comet.en_desc: A comet recently passed through this planet's Asteroid Belt, which was a spectacular sight!

recent_impact.zhcn_desc: 当地的殖民地最近被一个大型的小行星撞击所彻底摧毁。
recent_impact.en_desc: The local colony was recently rocked by the impact of a large Asteroid

magnetic_research_boost.zhcn_desc: 不知何故，这个星球的磁场干扰了我们的电脑，但没有造成寻常的破坏，反而使电脑运作更高效！
magnetic_research_boost.en_desc: Somehow the Magnetic field of this planet is interfering with our computers, but rather than a simple disruption it is actually making them more efficient!
magnetic_research_boost.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+20%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+20%§!

magnetic_disruption.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的磁场干扰着我们的电脑设备，严重影响了研究工作，民众也为此烦恼。
magnetic_disruption.en_desc: The Magnetic field of this planet is interfering with our computers, greatly disrupting research work and upsetting the populace.
magnetic_disruption.zhcn_modifier:
幸福度：§R-5%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§R-10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§R-10%§!

forest_fire.zhcn_desc: 森林大火导致了迁徙林木的大规模踩踏事件，并对几个农耕区域造成暂时性损害。
forest_fire.en_desc: A forest fire resulted in a stampede by this world's wandering forests, causing temporary damage to several farming regions.

nationalist_corruption.zhcn_desc: 在这个星球上，偏激的民族主义分子使生产效率降低了。
nationalist_corruption.en_desc: Subversive members of a Nationalist faction on this planet reduce output efficiency.

planet_separatist_strikes.zhcn_desc: 分离主义分子在这个星球上发动了罢工，并降低了潜在产出
planet_separatist_strikes.en_desc: Members of a Separatists faction are striking on this planet, reducing potential output.

stellarite_high_temp.zhcn_desc: 一个浑身发光的巨兽出现在这个星系，它让这个星球的地表温度升高了。
stellarite_high_temp.en_desc: A radiant monstrosity present in this system is increasing the surface temperature of the planet.

stellarite_low_temp.zhcn_desc: 一个浑身发光的巨兽吞食了这个星系太阳的一部分，这使得星球的地表温度比往常要低。
stellarite_low_temp.en_desc: A radiant monstrosity has devoured part of the star in this system, making the planetary bodies in orbit colder than usual.

planet_stability_low.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的资源：§R-50%§!\n贸易额：§R-50%§!\n迁出推动力：§G+100§!

planet_stability_high.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的资源：§G+30%§!\n贸易额：§G+30%§!\n迁入吸引力：§G+20§!

planet_crime.zhcn_desc: §E§Y犯罪度§!是量化行星上总体犯罪活动及法外行为程度的指标。高£crime£§Y犯罪度§!会导致负面事件甚至降低行星的£stability£§Y稳定度§!。庞大的行星人口会不可避免地导致犯罪度升高，而提高£happiness£§Y人口幸福度§!或者雇佣£job_enforcer£§Y执法者§!则可以有效降低犯罪度。§!
planet_crime.en_desc: §E§YCrime§! is a measure of the overall level of criminal activity and lawlessness on the planet. A high level of £crime£ §YCrime§! causes negative events to occur on the planet and may reduce £stability£ §YStability§!. It is naturally caused by having a large planetary population, and can be reduced by increasing £happiness£ §YPop Happiness§! or employing £job_enforcer£ §YEnforcers§!.§!

planet_crime_no_happiness.zhcn_desc: §E§Y反常度§!是量化行星上人口的异常行为和不顺从行为的指标。高§Y反常度§!会导致行星上发生负面事件甚至降低行星的£stability£§Y稳定度§!。庞大的行星人口会不可避免地导致反常度升高，而雇佣£job_patrol_drone£§Y猎寻者子个体§!则可以有效降低反常度。§!
planet_crime_no_happiness.en_desc: §E§YDeviancy§! is a measure of the overall level of anomalous behavior and non-compliance in the population on this planet. A high level of §YDeviancy§! causes negative events to occur on the planet and may reduce £stability£ §YStability§!. It is naturally caused by having a large planetary population, and can be reduced by employing £job_patrol_drone£ §YHunter-Seeker Drones§!.§!

land_appropriation.zhcn_desc: 拥有公民身份的移居者向这个星球的原住民征用土地以获取定居空间。\n\n§Y当此修正生效时，该星球上的非公民物种人口被禁止增长。§!
land_appropriation.en_desc: Land was seized from the native population of this planet to make room for citizen settlers.\n\n§YWhile this modifier is in effect, non-citizen species are not allowed to grow their population on this planet.§!

vultaum_homeworld.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球是先驱者文明沃陶姆曾经的母星。虽然整颗行星已经支离破碎并且不可能再支持任何生命存在，但我们仍能在行星表面发现大片的城市废墟。
vultaum_homeworld.en_desc: The ancient homeworld of the Vultaum. Though the planet has been shattered and no longer supports life, the remnants of vast cities can still be found on the surface.

vultaum_minerals.zhcn_desc: 一个沃陶姆的巨型轨道设施于千万年前坠毁在了这颗行星表面，使得行星表面布满了残骸和碎片。
vultaum_minerals.en_desc: A massive Vultaum orbital facility of some kind crashed on this planet eons ago. The surface is littered with debris.

vultaum_energy.zhcn_desc: 这颗气态巨行星曾经支撑着一个巨大的浮空采矿设施网络，这个巨大网络是沃陶姆用来提取氦-3的。
vultaum_energy.en_desc: This gas giant once supported a vast network of aerostat mining facilities that were used by the Vultaum to extract helium-3.

yuht_homeworld.zhcn_desc: 先驱者文明尤特人就是发源于这颗行星。行星的表面已经被轨道轰炸摧毁，绝大部分建筑早已化为废墟，但仍有一些地下设施可供研究。
yuht_homeworld.en_desc: The ancient Yuht originated on this planet. Orbital bombardment has pulverized most structures on the surface, but there are still pockets of abandoned subterranean habitats that could be studied.

yuht_minerals.zhcn_desc: 这个富矿的小行星带曾经被尤特人大规模开采，在这里采集到的矿物支持着尤特人星际帝国缓慢而又稳定的扩张。
yuht_minerals.en_desc: This rich asteroid belt was extensively mined by the Yuht, and the minerals found here supported the slow but steady expansion of their interstellar empire.

yuht_energy.zhcn_desc: 一些古老的太阳能收集阵列被尤特人部署在这颗气态巨行星的轨道上。令人难以置信的是，它们中的有些还能继续运转。
yuht_energy.en_desc: Several ancient solar collector arrays were placed in orbit around this gas giant by the Yuht. Incredibly, some of them are still functional.

first_league_homeworld.zhcn_desc: 这座行星规模的坟墓曾经是第一联盟伟大的行政中心。现在这颗行星已经成为了不能支持任何生命的不毛之地，但是完全覆盖行星表面的城市废墟依然随处可见。
first_league_homeworld.en_desc: This planetary mausoleum was once the shining administrative center of the First League. It no longer supports life, but ruins from the city that once stretched across the entire surface can be found everywhere.
first_league_homeworld.zhcn_modifier: 每月社会学研究：§G+10§!\n每月物理学研究：§G+10§!\n每月工程学研究：§G+10§!

first_league_minerals.zhcn_desc: 这个小行星带在第一联合鼎盛时期人烟浩穰。我们仍能在其中数千颗小行星上发现废弃的采矿设施。
first_league_minerals.en_desc: This asteroid belt was densely populated in the heyday of the First League. Abandoned mining facilities can be found on thousands of asteroids.

first_league_energy.zhcn_desc: 这个气态巨行星上建有几个巨大的维修平台，它们曾被用于维修第一联盟商舰队的货船。平台上的一些能源传输设备至今仍然能正常运行。
first_league_energy.en_desc: This gas giant was home to several colossal maintenance platforms that serviced the hundreds of thousands of freighters in the First League merchant marine. Some of the energy transfer equipment is still functional.

irassian_homeworld.zhcn_desc: 尽管遭到许多次轨道轰炸，伊瑞森母星上遗留的无数古器仍然是伊瑞森人那发达文明的象征。
irassian_homeworld.en_desc: Despite later attempts to sterilize its surface through orbital bombardment, the ancient homeworld of the Irassians is still home to a tremendous amount of artifacts from their advanced civilization.

irassian_minerals.zhcn_desc: 曾经是伊瑞森人星际舰队的主要停泊地，现在已化为一片废墟散落于星球轨道之上；这其中含有资源丰富的矿物。
irassian_minerals.en_desc: Once a major anchorage of the Irassian Starfleet, the ruined naval yards that litter the orbit of this planet have deposited a wealth of mineral resources to its surface.

irassian_energy.zhcn_desc: 在伊瑞森同盟早期的星际扩张时期，这个气态巨行星是伊瑞森同盟的重要能源产地。行星轨道上的大片发电站至今仍然存在。
irassian_energy.en_desc: This gas giant served as the key energy production site of the Irassian Concordat in the early stages of its interstellar expansion. A dense belt of ancient orbital power stations still ring the planet.

fleet_maneuvers_recruitment.zhcn_desc: §L最近的演习活动激发了公众对舰队兴趣。很多民众踊跃报名入伍，意味着我们可以花费更少的资源来为星舰补充人手。§!
fleet_maneuvers_recruitment.en_desc: §LThe recent naval drills have spurred a great deal of interest in the fleet among the public. We have no shortage of new recruits, which means that we will have to spend less resources to find crews for our starships.§!

fleet_maneuvers.zhcn_desc: §L我们最近的大规模舰队演习使得我们的船员训练有素，能够让舰只保持更高的开火速率。§!
fleet_maneuvers.en_desc: §LAs a result of the large fleet maneuvers we recently held, our well-trained naval crews are able to maintain a higher rate of fire.§!

maneuvers_canceled.zhcn_desc: §L我们的舰队中大部分领导层因为我们最近取消了计划内的舰队演习而感到不满。他们认为这是一种难以忍受的懦弱表现并且确信我们的邻国会利用这点。§!
maneuvers_canceled.en_desc: §LLarge segments of our military leadership are disgruntled due to the recent cancellation of our planned fleet maneuvers. They feel that it is an unacceptable sign of weakness that our neighbors are sure to take advantage of.§!
maneuvers_canceled.zhcn_modifier: 每月凝聚力：§R-5%§!\n舰船武器射速：§R-5%§!

maneuvers_no_protest.zhcn_desc: §L我们军队中大部分人都对于我们未能在外交上对最近发生在我们边境附近的大规模外国舰队演习进行抗议而大发雷霆。§!
maneuvers_no_protest.en_desc: §LA large segment of our military is furious over the fact that we failed to diplomatically object to the massive foreign fleet exercise that recently took place close to our borders.§!

marauder_1_tribute.zhcn_desc: 我们已经向[marauder_country.GetName]进贡了，他们同意暂时不攻击我们。
marauder_1_tribute.en_desc: We have offered tribute to the [marauder_country.GetName]. They have agreed not to attack us for a time.

marauder_2_tribute.zhcn_desc: 我们已经向[marauder_country.GetName]进贡了，他们同意暂时不攻击我们。
marauder_2_tribute.en_desc: We have offered tribute to the [marauder_country.GetName]. They have agreed not to attack us for a time.

marauder_3_tribute.zhcn_desc: 我们已经向[marauder_country.GetName]进贡了，他们同意暂时不攻击我们。
marauder_3_tribute.en_desc: We have offered tribute to the [marauder_country.GetName]. They have agreed not to attack us for a time.

marauder_skirmishing.zhcn_desc: 与边境上袭扰的掠夺者的不间断战斗使得我们的舰队在实战中得到了磨炼，增加了他们的战斗效率。
marauder_skirmishing.en_desc: Continual border skirmishes with roving Marauders have tempered our fleets in battle and increased their combat efficiency.

sentinel_data.zhcn_desc: 这些索林原虫的具体解剖资料是哨兵组织给予我们的。有了这些资料的帮助，我们已能在虫群生物的外骨骼上辨识出数处弱点。
sentinel_data.en_desc: These detailed anatomy files on the Prethoryn were given to us by the Sentinels. With their help we have been able to identify several weak points in the exoskeletons of the Prethoryn creatures.
sentinel_data.zhcn_modifier: 对普雷索林生物的伤害：§G+20%§!

synth_planet_paranoia.zhcn_desc: 这个星球处于高度的合成人渗透阴谋的迫害妄想中。有些人甚至认为整个政府机关都已经被合成人替换了。
synth_planet_paranoia.en_desc: There is a high level of paranoia on this world regarding Synth infiltrators. Some believe that all government officials have already been replaced by them.

fallen_empire_gift_databanks.zhcn_desc: 我们获得了来自某个失落帝国的礼物——科技数据缓存。这些数据可以大幅推进我们的科研水平。
fallen_empire_gift_databanks.en_desc: We have been gifted a cache of scientific data by a Fallen Empire. This will greatly enhance our research.
fallen_empire_gift_databanks.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+25%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+25%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+25%§!

machine_empire_inoculations_xenophobe.zhcn_desc: 我们允许了远古守护者给我们的人口接种以抵御“生物性弱点”。直到正面结果出现以前，我们的人口将因为被迫接种而产生不满。
machine_empire_inoculations_xenophobe.en_desc: We have allowed the Ancient Caretakers to inoculate our population against 'biological vulnerabilities'. Until we can see positive results, our population will be discontent with being forced to undergo these procedures.

machine_empire_inoculations.zhcn_desc: 我们允许了远古守护者给我们的人口接种以抵御“生物性弱点”。直到正面结果出现以前，我们的人口将因为被迫接种而产生不满。
machine_empire_inoculations.en_desc: We have allowed the Ancient Caretakers to inoculate our population against 'biological vulnerabilities'. Until we can see positive results, our population will be discontent with being forced to undergo these procedures.

machine_empire_health_boost.zhcn_desc: 远古守护者给予我们的疫苗显现出了巨大的好处，减少了疾病并增加了人口的寿命。
machine_empire_health_boost.en_desc: The inoculations given to us by the Ancient Caretakers have proven of immense benefit, reducing illness and increasing the life expectancy of our population.
machine_empire_health_boost.zhcn_modifier: 人口增长速度：§G+5%§!\n领袖预期寿命：§G+10§!

machine_empire_mutations.zhcn_desc: 远古守护者给予我们的疫苗与我们的生理机能互不相容，在人民中产生了大量恶心而致命的突变。
machine_empire_mutations.en_desc: The inoculations given to us by the Ancient Caretakers have proven incompatible with our physiology, resulting in numerous unpleasant and lethal mutations among the population.
machine_empire_mutations.zhcn_modifier: 领袖预期寿命：§R-10§!\n人口增长速度：§R-10%§!\n幸福度：§R-20%§!

machine_empire_code_rewrite.zhcn_desc: 我们允许了远古守护者重写我们基础代码中的一些部分。在对人民进行这些改变的这段时期，我们的能源需求将暂时增加。
machine_empire_code_rewrite.en_desc: We have allowed the Ancient Caretakers to rewrite certain parts of our base code. This will temporarily increase our energy requirements while the changes are being rolled out across the population.

machine_empire_code_improvements.zhcn_desc: 远古守护者在我们的基础代码中进行的改变产生了良好的结果，给我们全体人民带来了永久性的资源生产力升级。
machine_empire_code_improvements.en_desc: The changes that the Ancient Caretakers made to our code base have turned out well, and has resulted in an permanent upgrade in resource production capabilities across our whole population.

machine_empire_code_bugs.zhcn_desc: 远古守护者在我们的基础代码中进行的改变与我们其他核心组件中的程序不兼容。直到这些代码改变被还原之前，我们将经历一段生产力低下的时期。
machine_empire_code_bugs.en_desc: The changes that the Ancient Caretakers made to our base code has turned out to be incompatible with other core parts of our programming. Until the code changes can be fully reverted, we can expect a period of lowered productivity.
machine_empire_code_bugs.zhcn_modifier: 机器人维护费：§R+5%§!\n机器人产出：§R-20%§!

dportal_trade_normal.zhcn_desc: 与镜像中的我们进行贸易，对我们两界都有益。
dportal_trade_normal.en_desc: Trade with our Mirror-selves will benefit both our realms.

dportal_trade_low.zhcn_desc: 镜像宇宙中近期发生的事件减少了经由传送门的贸易量。
dportal_trade_low.en_desc: Recent events in the Mirrorverse have reduced the volume of trade through the Portal.

dportal_trade_high.zhcn_desc: 由于镜像中的我们正飞黄腾达，经由传送门的贸易量猛增！
dportal_trade_high.en_desc: Our Mirror-selves are prospering and trade is booming through the Portal!

dportal_trade_crisis.zhcn_desc: 镜像中的我们正在经历一场危机。由于曲速兽的威胁，贸易量正处于历史最低点，而难民每天都在从传送门中涌出。每一批难民都显得更加绝望。
dportal_trade_crisis.en_desc: Our Mirror-selves are experiencing a crisis. Beset by the Warp beasts their trade is at an all-time low, and refugees stream daily through the portal. Each wave looks increasingly desperate.

drone_space_elevator.zhcn_desc: 因为忙于摧毁巨大的太空电梯，这个行星的生产力降低了。
drone_space_elevator.en_desc: Efforts to demolish a gigantic space elevator slows down production on this planet.

drone_mineral_gift.zhcn_desc: 无数个年代前的无人机将一堆矿物储存在这里了。看来是前人种树你乘凉了。
drone_mineral_gift.en_desc: Drones from a bygone era dumped a cache of minerals here. For your benefit, apparently.

drone_fl_satellite.zhcn_name: 坠毁的第一联盟人造卫星
drone_fl_satellite.zhcn_desc: 一个古老的人造卫星向宇宙中发射出史前信息。
drone_fl_satellite.en_desc: An old satellite spews prehistoric communications into the ether.

rock_brain.zhcn_desc: 这些石头看起来似乎是...具有思想的。嘛，这种事情可能吗？
rock_brain.en_desc: The stone seems to be... thinking. Is such a thing possible?

cunning_flora.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的植物不仅极具攻击性而且有着比较复杂的社会秩序。
cunning_flora.en_desc: Plants on this planet exhibit both extreme aggression and a relatively complex social order.

fascinating_flora.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球长着美丽的玛琳卡林花。
fascinating_flora.en_desc: This planet is home to the wonderful Mharin Kharin flower.

old_genetic_library.zhcn_desc: 这个小行星建有一座古老的基因贮藏设施。
old_genetic_library.en_desc: This asteroid houses an old DNA storage facility.

zro_ice.zhcn_desc: 肆虐的暴风雪中暗藏着少量的泽珞。
zro_ice.en_desc: There are pockets of Zro trapped in the ice giant's roiling atmosphere.

dark_matter_funnel.zhcn_desc: 一个微型虫洞允许你更简单地获取暗物质。
dark_matter_funnel.en_desc: A miniature wormhole allows easy access to Dark Matter.

pheromoned_1.zhcn_desc: 空气中的花粉跟你人们的信息素受体发生化学作用，导致他们很开心。
pheromoned_1.en_desc: The pollen in the atmosphere interacts with your people's pheromone receptors, making them happy.

pheromoned_2.zhcn_desc: 空气中的花粉跟你人们的信息素受体发生化学作用，导致他们不事生产。
pheromoned_2.en_desc: The pollen in the atmosphere interacts with your people's pheromone receptors, making them less productive.

depheromoned_1.zhcn_desc: 政府高层设下的模范跟你的人们的能力和工作意愿产生了化学作用，导致他们生产效率提高。
depheromoned_1.en_desc: The paradigms implemented by upper management interact with your people's ability and willingness to work, making them more productive.

pheromoned_3.zhcn_desc: 空气中的花粉跟你人们的信息素受体发生化学作用，导致他们不爱殖民。
pheromoned_3.en_desc: The pollen in the atmosphere interacts with your people's pheromone receptors, making them less likely to migrate.

pheromoned_4.zhcn_desc: 空气中的花粉跟你人们的信息素受体发生化学作用，导致他们痴迷生产，但是不喜欢受外界干扰。
pheromoned_4.en_desc: The pollen in the atmosphere interacts with your people's pheromone receptors, making them more productive but less happy with outside interference.
pheromoned_4.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的资源：§G+5%§!\n幸福度：§R-10%§!

pheromoned_detox.zhcn_desc: 盛开的玛琳卡林花移除了行星上的整个生物圈以及生物圈中的一切生灵。新的循环开始了。
pheromoned_detox.en_desc: The Mharin Kharin bloom has killed the planet's biosphere, along with everything within it. A new cycle begins.

uplift_rocky.zhcn_desc: 此行星上被提升的物种有点不适应新的社会秩序。
uplift_rocky.en_desc: The uplifted species on this planet has some trouble adjusting to the new social order.

unhappy_with_experiments.zhcn_desc: 行星上的$XenophileY$人口不满统治者对当地原始物种生物的不人道实验。
unhappy_with_experiments.en_desc: The planet's $XenophileY$ population is unhappy with unethical experiments on native life-forms.

unproductive_without_experiments.zhcn_desc: 行星上的$Society researchY$产出因为科学家放过了千载难逢的实验和临床测验机会而受到影响。
unproductive_without_experiments.en_desc: The planet's $Society researchY$ output suffers as excellent opportunities for experimentation and clinical tests pass scientists by.
unproductive_without_experiments.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-20%§!

projecting_moon.zhcn_desc: 这颗卫星上有一个强大的通讯设备，可以产生以假乱真的勘测读数。
projecting_moon.en_desc: A powerful comms device capable of convincingly faking survey readings is active on this moon.

unbalanced_ecosystem.zhcn_desc: 生物圈中植物生命的极度同质化倾向使得星球不适合农业种植。
unbalanced_ecosystem.en_desc: The biosphere's tendencies toward extreme homogeneity in plant life makes the planet unsuitable for agricultural pursuits.

cornucopia.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上拥有丰富的食物资源可以开发。
cornucopia.en_desc: This planet is home to an abundance of viable food sources.

raw_materials.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上拥有丰富的矿物和矿石资源，且都易开采。
raw_materials.en_desc: This planet is home to an abundance of easily-accessible minerals and ores.

shadow_play.zhcn_desc: 一道阴影无声地划过星球的表面，留下了意图明显但意义不明的痕迹。
shadow_play.en_desc: Shadows drift across the surface of this planet, forming shapes of apparent intent but indeterminable meaning.

grimacing.zhcn_desc: 这个行星的内部激荡变化很值得研究。
grimacing.en_desc: This planet's internal turmoil makes for an interesting object of study.

comet_sighted_negative.zhcn_desc: 这颗有威胁的彗星在你的首都人口中产生了负面的影响。
comet_sighted_negative.en_desc: The menacing comet has a negative influence on your Capital's Pops.

comet_sighted_positive.zhcn_desc: 一颗巨大的彗星激励了你的首都人民。
comet_sighted_positive.en_desc: A majestic comet inspires your Capital's Pops.

skid_marks.zhcn_desc: 这些痕迹表明在这颗小行星上举办过激烈的赛车比赛。
skid_marks.en_desc: There are signs of rather violent bouts of vehicular racing having taken place on this asteroid.

dust_circuits.zhcn_desc: 某种巨大的轨道设施在很久以前撞击到这个小行星上，留下了不完整但十分清晰的印记。
dust_circuits.en_desc: Some kind of immense orbital installation bumped into this asteroid in the distant past, leaving a partial but very clear imprint on the surface.

unusual_tectonics.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球呈现出一种极不寻常的构造物理性质。
unusual_tectonics.en_desc: This planet exhibits highly unusual tectonophysical properties.

massex_happy.zhcn_desc: 你的人民对于拥有一个光明的未来生活相当有自信。
massex_happy.en_desc: Your people are confident that a bright future lies ahead.

stellar_salt.zhcn_desc: 我们的帝国出现了一场美食革命。
stellar_salt.en_desc: A culinary renaissance sweeps across our Empire.

inspired_arts.zhcn_desc: 一个新的大胆的灵感来源鼓舞着你的帝国，不论是文化上还是商业上。
inspired_arts.en_desc: A bold new source of inspiration invigorates your empire, culturally and commercially.

ruler_failed_savior.zhcn_desc: 一次失败的救援行动使得我们的人们痛苦不堪
ruler_failed_savior.en_desc: A failed rescue attempt leaves our people devastated.

ruler_savior.zhcn_desc: 这次成功的救援行动使得快乐在人群中传播
ruler_savior.en_desc: A successful rescue attempt is cause for great joy among our people.

missing_scientist.zhcn_desc: 一个在观测站上工作的科学家失踪了，在科学界中掀起了波澜。
missing_scientist.en_desc: A scientist working with an observation post was lost, causing ripples in the scientific community.
missing_scientist.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-10%§!

humiliated.en_desc: §LWe were publicly humiliated by another Empire.§!

raided.zhcn_desc: §L在这些掠夺者面前，我们没能保护好自己。§!
raided.en_desc: §LWe failed to protect ourselves against the Despoilers.§!

drone_processing.zhcn_desc: 从古代采矿无人机处学习到的知识正持续改善我们的采矿产量以及矿物加工效率。
drone_processing.en_desc: Lessons learned from the Ancient Mining Drones continue to improve mining output and mineral processing efficiency.

6_hour_workday.zhcn_desc: 在更好的工作环境下进行无薪酬劳动。
6_hour_workday.en_desc: Laboring without pay under improved working conditions.

hunger_strike.zhcn_desc: 这些人并不会摄取足够的营养来维持最佳生产力。
hunger_strike.en_desc: This Pop will not consume sufficient nutrients to maintain optimal productivity.

peace_strike.zhcn_desc: 这些人会用他们的一部分时间来抗议战争，这会导致生产力的降低。
peace_strike.en_desc: This Pop will dedicate some of their time to protesting the war, resulting in a loss of productivity.

culture_shock_stone_age.en_desc: This Pop is still adjusting to life under their new xeno overlords.

crystal_hunting_buff.zhcn_desc: 战斗之后我们自动回收了晶态实体的残骸，每击败一支舰队可获得£minerals£ §G500§!。
crystal_hunting_buff.en_desc: The shattered remains of Crystalline Entities are automatically salvaged after battle, bringing in £minerals£ §G500§! for every fleet destroyed.

crystal_focus.zhcn_desc: 根据晶态实体内部独特结构开发的高级传送介质可以将能源生产与分配过程中的阻抗损耗降至最低。
crystal_focus.en_desc: Improved transmission mediums modeled after the Crystalline Entities' unique internal structures minimize resistive losses in energy production and distribution.
crystal_focus.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+5%§!

pacified_crystals.zhcn_desc: 通过使用特定频率的短波广播，我们可将舰队伪装成为晶态实体，因此这种宇宙生物将不再把我们视为威胁。
pacified_crystals.en_desc: Short-wave broadcasts at certain frequencies effectively disguise our fleets as fellow Crystalline Entities, and the spaceborne creatures no longer recognize us as a threat.

flagellating_movement.zhcn_desc: 通过对太空变形虫鞭毛的观察，我们更新了舰队在规避时的姿态方案。
flagellating_movement.en_desc: We have updated our Evasive fleet stance protocols based on observations of the Space Amoebas' flagella.

amoeba_hunting_buff.zhcn_desc: 战斗之后我们收集了变形虫的残骸，并从其内部器官中收获了价值可观的有机合成物，每击败一支舰队可获得£energy£ §G1000§!。
amoeba_hunting_buff.en_desc: Amoeba carcasses are rounded up after battle and their internal organs harvested for valuable organic compounds, bringing in £energy£ §G1000§! for every fleet destroyed.

pacified_amoebas.zhcn_desc: 舰队在接近太空变形虫时会严格控制自己的辐射放射量，因此这种变形虫将不再将我们视为威胁。
pacified_amoebas.en_desc: Fleets regulate radiation venting when approaching Space Amoebas, and the spaceborne creatures no longer recognize us as a threat.

cloud_hunting_buff.zhcn_desc: 虚空之云的电荷会以可见的高速循环进行波动。若能以精确定时进行高速轰击，即可使其结构产生极大的不稳定能源，令其中个体活性化。
cloud_hunting_buff.en_desc: The Void Clouds' charge fluctuates in a rapid but observable cycle. Striking with precise timing dramatically destabilizes the inscrutable energies that animate the entities.

void_loops.zhcn_desc: 虚空之云的异常属性为物理研究打开了新的大门。
void_loops.en_desc: The anomalous nature of the Void Clouds open up new possibilities in physics research.
void_loops.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!

cosmic_ray_catalysis.zhcn_desc: 我们的发电厂现在可以将某些宇宙射线转化为可用的能源。
cosmic_ray_catalysis.en_desc: Our Power Plants can now convert some cosmic radiation into usable energy.

drone_hunting_buff.zhcn_desc: 这些采矿无人机明显是量产品。只要找到一个的弱点，就相当于破解了全部。
drone_hunting_buff.en_desc: The Mining Drones are obviously mass-produced. A weakness found in one is a weakness found in all.
drone_hunting_buff.zhcn_modifier: 对古代采矿无人机的伤害：§G+33%§!

drone_mining_techniques.zhcn_desc: 通过使用从采矿无人机中取得的技术，我们终于能够有效采集之前认为不值得利用的矿脉了。
drone_mining_techniques.en_desc: Using techniques derived from the Mining Drones allows us to efficiently exploit mineral veins previously not deemed worth the trouble.

grand_design.zhcn_desc: 甘做社会螺钉的人有福了，伟大的事业往往源于平凡。
grand_design.en_desc: Blessed is the cog in the machine.

prismatic_lenses.zhcn_desc: 模仿晶状生命体独特的柱状性能所造的透镜对物理学的研究有巨大的贡献。
prismatic_lenses.en_desc: Lenses mimicking the unique prismatic properties of the Crystalline Entities contribute greatly to Physics research.
prismatic_lenses.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!

amoeba_extirpator.zhcn_desc: 我方舰队善于瞄准太空变形虫的薄弱之处。
amoeba_extirpator.en_desc: Our fleets excel at targeting the weak points of the Space Amoebas.

crystal_breaker.zhcn_desc: 我方舰队的瞄准系统专门为晶态实体的角度形态而调整过，可以达到最大伤害输出。
crystal_breaker.en_desc: Our fleets' targeting systems have adapted to the angular topography of the Crystalline Entities, maximizing damage output.

drone_destroyer.zhcn_desc: 更新后的预测算法可使我方舰船更好地追踪并攻击迅捷的古代采矿无人机。
drone_destroyer.en_desc: Updated prediction algorithms allow our ships to better track and hit the nimble Ancient Mining Drones.
drone_destroyer.zhcn_modifier: 对古代采矿无人机的伤害：§G+10%§!

drone_bounty.zhcn_desc: §L命令你的舰队回收被击溃的古代采矿无人机能源电池。§!\n击败一支舰队所获的能量币：§G500§!
drone_bounty.en_desc: §LOrder your fleets to salvage the energy cells of defeated Ancient Mining Drones.§!\nEnergy Credits per fleet defeated: §G500§!

cloudbuster.zhcn_desc: 我们已经调整了我们的武器装备从而扰乱了虚空云怪的磁场，使得长期的破坏潜力得到提升。
cloudbuster.en_desc: We have adjusted our weaponry to disrupt the Void Clouds' magnetic fields, increasing long-term damage potential.

pirate_power.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器射速：§G+100%§!\n每日船体再生：§G+0.5%§!\n每日装甲再生：§G+0.5%§!

cloud_power.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器伤害：§G+200%§!\n每日船体再生：§G+10§!\n每日护盾再生：§G+30§!

sanctuary_power.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器射速：§G+100%§!\n每日船体再生：§G+0.5%§!\n每日装甲再生：§G+0.5%§!

technosphere_power.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器伤害：§G+150%§!\n护盾承受值：§G+500%§!

armistice_power.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器射速：§G+100%§!\n每日船体再生：§G+0.5%§!\n每日装甲再生：§G+0.5%§!

droning_optimizations.zhcn_desc: 标准采矿规范的调整使得能源消耗得到了显著的降低。
droning_optimizations.en_desc: Adjustments to standard mining practices allow for significantly reduced Energy expenditure.
droning_optimizations.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+15%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§R-10%§!

syndaw_congregating_robots.zhcn_desc: 它们就伫立在那里。一动不动。静静凝视着什么。
syndaw_congregating_robots.en_desc: They just stand there. Completely still. Staring.
syndaw_congregating_robots.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£unity£ 凝聚力：§R-10%§!

uprising_ai_buff.zhcn_modifier: 每月£minerals£ 矿物：§G+100§!\n每月£energy£ 能量币：§G+100§!\n海军容量：§G+1000%§!

syndaw_patched_systems.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§R-10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§R-10%§!

acid_jungles.zhcn_desc: 进化产生了能够流出酸液的植物，使人很难横穿丛林或在此殖民。
acid_jungles.en_desc: Evolution has produced trees and foliage that exude acids and make the terrain dangerous to traverse or settle in.

hostile_environment.zhcn_desc: 这里的环境非常危险，不适合生存。
hostile_environment.en_desc: The environment is dangerous and not optimal for survival.

ex_planet.zhcn_desc: 这条小行星带是一个曾经拥有生命的行星的残骸。
ex_planet.en_desc: The asteroid belt used to be a planet with the promise of life.

ship_graveyard.zhcn_desc: 许多星舰曾在此毁灭，将此处变成了一个星舰塚；这里很多材料唾手可得。
ship_graveyard.en_desc: A multitude of starships have crashed here, creating a figurative graveyard full of materials to scavenge.

ai_fleet.zhcn_desc: 在这颗星球上有一支坠毁的舰队，它是由人工智能控制；这给我们提供了珍贵的工程数据以供研究。
ai_fleet.en_desc: A fleet controlled by an AI lies destroyed on the planet, giving us valuable engineering data to research.

irradiated_wasteland.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球被射线轰击了，其上的绝大部分区域都不再适宜生物生存。
irradiated_wasteland.en_desc: The planet has been bombarded with radiation, making large parts of it dangerous to most living creatures.

ancient_one.zhcn_desc: 一个古老的存在。其居住在深海之下，是该星球上最强大的存在。
ancient_one.en_desc: An ancient being, living deep beneath the waves, is the dominating life force on this planet.

fallen_robots.zhcn_desc: 行星上有着一些失落的文明建造的机器人，给我们提供了珍贵的工程数据以供研究。
fallen_robots.en_desc: The planet holds old robots built by a fallen society, giving us engineering material to research.

liquid_sands.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被近乎液态的沙子所覆盖，奇特的矿物成分提供了大量的研究机会。
liquid_sands.en_desc: Sand covers this planet, so fine grained it resembles a liquid. The odd composition of minerals provide ample amounts of research.

abandoned_mining.zhcn_desc: 一个古老的采矿设施围绕着这个星球旋转，证明这里有可能有潜在的资源。
abandoned_mining.en_desc: An old mining station was orbiting the planet, showing that there's potential resources to be had here.

gas_responsible_mining.zhcn_desc: 节省这颗星球上的珍稀气体资源可在长期内保持能源生产的效益。
gas_responsible_mining.en_desc: Saving a sparse yet valuable gas resource on this planet helps to make its energy production more efficient in the long term.

gas_rich_planet.zhcn_desc: 在这颗星球上建立殖民地以开发其资源。\n£energy£ §G+50%§!
gas_rich_planet.en_desc: Construct a colony on this planet to begin tapping its resource.\n£energy£ §G+50%§!

gas_rich_planet_fo_realz.zhcn_desc: 对这颗星球上稀有自然资源的开采会在短期内大幅度增加整体能源生产。
gas_rich_planet_fo_realz.en_desc: The sparse natural resources on this planet are currently being mined to boost the overall energy production.
gas_rich_planet_fo_realz.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+50%§!

food_rich_planet.zhcn_desc: 星球上的植物群提供了富含营养的水果和物质，可以改进生存环境。
food_rich_planet.en_desc: The planet's flora provides nutritious fruits and substances that improves living conditions.

super_sensor_array.zhcn_desc: 一个强大的传感器阵列能够探测到更加详细的周边情况。
super_sensor_array.en_desc: A strong sensor array provides a greater overview of the surrounding area.
super_sensor_array.zhcn_modifier: 行星探测范围：§G+4§!\n行星超空间探测距离：§G+6§!

horse_powered_factories_low.zhcn_desc: 驯化四足动物来减轻工作负担，尽管它们是被强迫的。
horse_powered_factories_low.en_desc: Domesticated quadrapeds help alleviate work conditions, although not willingly.
horse_powered_factories_low.zhcn_modifier: 建筑花费：§G-5%§!\n星球建造速度：§G+5%§!

horse_powered_factories_medium.zhcn_desc: 驯化四足动物来减轻工作负担，尽管它们是不情愿的。
horse_powered_factories_medium.en_desc: Domesticated quadrapeds help alleviate work conditions, although reluctantly.
horse_powered_factories_medium.zhcn_modifier: 建筑花费：§G-10%§!\n星球建造速度：§G+10%§!

horse_powered_factories_high.zhcn_desc: 与我们结盟的四足动物可以减轻工作负担。
horse_powered_factories_high.en_desc: Allied quadrapeds help alleviate work conditions.
horse_powered_factories_high.zhcn_modifier: 建筑花费：§G-15%§!\n星球建造速度：§G+15%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-10%§!

hostile_animal_life.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的原生生物似乎对我们很不友好。
hostile_animal_life.en_desc: The planet is host to hostile creatures that are not happy to see us.

society_animal_life.zhcn_desc: 非常奇异的动物在这颗行星上栖居。它们提供了有趣的社会学研究机会。
society_animal_life.en_desc: Particularly odd animals inhabit this planet. They provide interesting society research opportunities.
society_animal_life.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+25%§!

shifting_sands.zhcn_desc: 这颗沙漠行星由近乎液态的沙子组成，使得在上面建造变得极为困难。
shifting_sands.en_desc: The desert planet consists of a near-liquid grained sand that makes construction extremely difficult.

suppressed_opposition.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的一部分人口曾因为反抗政府而被镇压。
suppressed_opposition.en_desc: A certain part of the population of this planet has been violently suppressed for their opposition of the government.

scared_population.zhcn_desc: 这部分人口在恐惧中劳动，害怕外星工厂会夺取更多人命
scared_population.en_desc: The population works in fear that an alien factory will take more lives.

secured_factory.zhcn_desc: 付出金钱和努力确保外星工厂的工作环境安全。
secured_factory.en_desc: Cost and effort goes into making sure an alien factory is secure to work in.
secured_factory.zhcn_modifier: 法令花费：§R+25%§!\n星球建造速度：§R-25%§!

fear_as_control.zhcn_desc: 罪犯受到惩戒，促使人们采取行动。
fear_as_control.en_desc: Offenders have been punished in order to motivate the people to action.

fear_as_control_militarist.zhcn_desc: 罪犯受到惩戒，促使人们采取行动。
fear_as_control_militarist.en_desc: Offenders have been punished in order to motivate the people to action.

infectious_disease.zhcn_desc: 一种传染性很强的疾病散播开来，新的困境出现，人们受到威胁。
infectious_disease.en_desc: A highly infectious disease has been let loose, creating new strands and endangering the population.

pyramid_wars.zhcn_desc: 人们对“天命之神”的本质产生了不同的理解，信念不和导致人们兵戎相见。
pyramid_wars.en_desc: The people have broken out into an all out war due to a religious conflict regarding the true nature of the "Skyborn God."

syndaw_automated_work.zhcn_desc: 无论合理与否，由于自动化带来的失业恐慌正在这颗星球上蔓延。
syndaw_automated_work.en_desc: Whether justified or not, fears of unemployment due to automation are affecting this planet.

syndaw_unfriendly_robots.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星上的机器人和有机人口之间关系紧张，降低了我们的£unity£凝聚力产出。
syndaw_unfriendly_robots.en_desc: Tensions between robotic and organic populations on the planet have reduced our £unity£ Unity output.

syndaw_research_malus.zhcn_desc: 一个牵涉到社会研究的实验室AI遭受了严重的硬件损害，现在正在被相关人员替换。
syndaw_research_malus.en_desc: A lab AI involved in societal research has suffered terminal hardware damage and is being replaced.
syndaw_research_malus.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-10%§!

scientist_team_well_treated.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!

health_discovery.zhcn_modifier: 有机人口幸福度：§G+10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!

solar_harvesting_bacteria.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+5%§!

army_inspiration.zhcn_modifier: 陆军建造速度：§G+20%§!\n陆军士气：§G+20%§!

army_inspiration_mach.zhcn_name: 集中化陆军单元组装器
army_inspiration_mach.zhcn_modifier: 陆军建造速度：§G+20%§!\n陆军士气：§G+20%§!

ship_orbit_repair.zhcn_modifier: 每日船体再生：§G+2%§!\n每日装甲再生：§G+2%§!

station_self_repair.zhcn_modifier: 每日船体再生：§G+1%§!\n每日装甲再生：§G+1%§!

enclave_artist_patron.zhcn_desc: 你决定为支持新艺术的发展奉上时间和精力。
enclave_artist_patron.en_desc: You are dedicating time and effort to supporting the development of new art.

enclave_artist_festival_outrage.zhcn_desc: 参加星球艺术节的群众相互践踏，导致整个星球陷入了恐慌混乱。
enclave_artist_festival_outrage.en_desc: The Festival of Worlds brought about chaos on this planet as the crowds trampled their fellow citizens.
enclave_artist_festival_outrage.zhcn_modifier: 幸福度：§R-20%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§R-10%§!

spectral_residue_studies.zhcn_modifier: 研究速度（£physics£ 物理学）：§G+5%§!\n能量武器伤害：§G+5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+10%§!

black_hole_pantagruel.zhcn_desc: 庞大古埃黑洞成为了我们观察新形成宇宙的魔镜。如果能在其轨道上建造空间站，则可以为我们提供巨大的研究潜力。
black_hole_pantagruel.en_desc: The Pantagruel black hole has become a mirror into a newly created universe, opening up tremendous potential for research if we build a station in its orbit.

germinating_wraith.zhcn_desc: 某个邪恶的东西要来了。

enclave_artist_festival.zhcn_desc: 艺术节由艺术家剧团举办。在整个帝国传播欢乐。
enclave_artist_festival.en_desc: A festival organized by the Artisan Troupe, spreading joy across the empire.

draconic_beats.zhcn_desc: 我们的舰队接到指令，当攻击以太巨龙时要以特定的节奏开火。
draconic_beats.en_desc: Military fleets have been instructed to fire at the Ether Drake in a specific rhythm when engaging the dragon.

curator_buff_stellarite.zhcn_desc: 策展人建议我们对噬星者的调节活栓开火，以分散其内部的热能。
curator_buff_stellarite.en_desc: The Curators have instructed us to fire at the Stellar Devourer's regulatory valves in order to disperse its inner heat.

curator_buff_sphere.zhcn_desc: 无限神机的实时威胁更新系统有一个弱点。它不能跟上持续的变化。今后我们要为每艘舰船安排一名船员负责不断调校舰载武器。
curator_buff_sphere.en_desc: The Infinity Machine's real-time threat update system has one weak spot. It cannot keep up with constant change. We will henceforth assign a crew member on each ship to constantly make calibrations to the ship guns.

dimensional_horror_weak_points.zhcn_desc: 如果我们对位面之魇产生的传送门的弱点进行精确打击，它将会很快失去稳定性。
dimensional_horror_weak_points.en_desc: The portal spawned by the Dimensional Horror can be destabilized if we launch pinpoint attacks against certain weak areas.

automated_dreadnought_weak_points.zhcn_desc: 舰队指挥官收到命令，要求集中攻击这艘自动无畏战舰的相关子系统，以关闭它的自动化程序。
automated_dreadnought_weak_points.en_desc: Fleet commanders engaging the Automated Dreadnought have been instructed to target any subsystems that will impair its automation processes.
automated_dreadnought_weak_points.zhcn_modifier: 对自动无畏战舰的伤害：§G+25%§!

asteroid_hive_weak_points.zhcn_desc: 最新的瞄准数据可以让我们的舰队集中火力，轰击小行星蜂巢表层装甲最薄弱之处。
asteroid_hive_weak_points.en_desc: Updated targeting data will allow our fleets to bombard Asteroid Hives where their surface armor is the most vulnerable.

curator_insight.zhcn_desc: 策展人同你分享了他们的知识。尽管这些知识还需要大量的解读，但这毫无疑问增进了你对宇宙的理解。
curator_insight.en_desc: The Curators have shared their knowledge with you. Although requiring extensive interpretation, this will surely advance your understanding.

infinity_calculations.zhcn_desc: 帮助无限神机后，它给予了我们它的本源秘辛。原来它是个可以自我扩展的处理器单元。这将进一步增强我们的科研能力。
infinity_calculations.en_desc: Assisting the Infinity Machine made it grant us the secret behind its origin. A processing unit capable of expanding upon itself. This will further enhance our research capabilities.

infinity_calculations_hacked.zhcn_desc: 骇入这个球形机器后，我们成功揭开了它的运算能力的秘密。这将大幅增强我们的科研能力。
infinity_calculations_hacked.en_desc: Hacking into the spherical machine allowed us to learn the secret behind its processing power. This greatly enhances our research potential.

black_hole_pantagruel_research.zhcn_desc: 我们窥视了庞大古埃黑洞中的镜像宇宙，增强了我们的科研能力。
black_hole_pantagruel_research.en_desc: We have gazed into the mirror universe of the Pantagruel black hole, enhancing our research capabilities.

technosphere_praising.zhcn_desc: 我们的人民对这个巨大球型计算机顶礼膜拜，将之视为圣族在这个的世界真正力量。
technosphere_praising.en_desc: Our people are praising the gigantic spherical calculator as a sign of the Divines' true power in the world.

embraced_faction_timer.zhcn_desc: 我们不久前通过接纳一个派系转变了我们的主流思潮，短期内我们无法再次这样做。
embraced_faction_timer.en_desc: We recently changed our Governing Ethics by embracing a Faction and will not be able to do so again for some time.

suppressed_xenophobe.zhcn_desc: §H排外主义§!思潮正在被政府镇压。
suppressed_xenophobe.en_desc: The §HXenophobe§! Ethic is being suppressed by the government.
suppressed_xenophobe.zhcn_modifier: 排外主义思潮吸引力：§R-75%§!\n每月影响力：§R-1§!

promoted_xenophobe.zhcn_desc: §H排外主义§!思潮得到了政府的鼓励。
promoted_xenophobe.en_desc: The §HXenophobe§! Ethic is being promoted by the government.
promoted_xenophobe.zhcn_modifier: 排外主义思潮吸引力：§G+100%§!\n每月影响力：§R-2§!

suppressed_xenophile.zhcn_desc: §H亲外主义§!思潮正在被政府镇压。
suppressed_xenophile.en_desc: The §HXenophile§! Ethic is being suppressed by the government.
suppressed_xenophile.zhcn_modifier: 亲外主义思潮吸引力：§R-75%§!\n每月影响力：§R-1§!

promoted_xenophile.zhcn_desc: §H亲外主义§!思潮得到了政府的鼓励。
promoted_xenophile.en_desc: The §HXenophile§! Ethic is being promoted by the government.
promoted_xenophile.zhcn_modifier: 亲外主义思潮吸引力：§G+100%§!\n每月影响力：§R-2§!

suppressed_spiritualist.en_desc: The §HSpiritualist§! Ethic is being suppressed by the government.
suppressed_spiritualist.zhcn_modifier: 唯心主义思潮吸引力：§R-75%§!\n每月影响力：§R-1§!

promoted_spiritualist.zhcn_desc: §H唯心主义§!思潮得到了政府的鼓励。
promoted_spiritualist.en_desc: The §HSpiritualist§! Ethic is being promoted by the government.
promoted_spiritualist.zhcn_modifier: 唯心主义思潮吸引力：§G+100%§!\n每月影响力：§R-2§!

suppressed_materialist.zhcn_desc: §H唯物主义§!思潮正在被政府镇压。
suppressed_materialist.en_desc: The §HMaterialist§! Ethic is being suppressed by the government.
suppressed_materialist.zhcn_modifier: 唯物主义思潮吸引力：§R-75%§!\n每月影响力：§R-1§!

happy_with_open_loop_temple.zhcn_desc: 热情洋溢而又训练有素的员工带领着游客，在泛光灯的指引下穿过那些原始的发光饰板，墙上挂满了帮助提示。
happy_with_open_loop_temple.en_desc: Cheery, efficient staff run guided tours past primordial sigils bright under floodlights and marked with helpful plaques.

spiritual_happy_with_open_loop_temple.zhcn_desc: 再一次，伴随着低语，玄武岩建成的长廊中回荡起轻促的脚步声和朝圣者的祷告。
spiritual_happy_with_open_loop_temple.en_desc: Once again, the basalt arches whisper with the hushing of feet and the echo of prayers.

waiting_world_ruins.zhcn_desc: 风在废墟中叹息。这里人迹罕至。
waiting_world_ruins.en_desc: The wind sighs in the ruins. No-one goes there.

worm_quarantined.zhcn_desc: 你可以占据整片星海——唯独此处不容你染指。
worm_quarantined.en_desc: ALL THESE WORLDS ARE YOURS - EXCEPT THIS ONE.

worm_manifestation.zhcn_modifier: 装甲值：§R-80%§!\n舰船武器伤害：§R-80%§!\n护盾承受值：§R-80%§!

megastructure_demands_rejected.zhcn_desc: 由于无人听取自己的担忧与意见，人民十分失望。
megastructure_demands_rejected.en_desc: Pops are disappointed about concerns not being heard.

standardized_colony_ships.zhcn_modifier: 殖民船建造速度：§G+100%§!\n殖民船建造花费：§G-50%§!

withdrawal_symptoms.zhcn_desc: 走出§Y化学极乐§!制造的与世隔绝、无忧无虑的幸福世界通常都会伴随着痛苦，但这种痛苦稍纵即逝。当人们意识到自己眼前那令人陶醉的多彩景象全都是虚幻时，这种痛苦才是悲痛欲绝，或许人们永远都不能从这份痛苦中解脱出来。
withdrawal_symptoms.en_desc: Emergence from §YChemical Bliss§! and its detached, cushioned world of instant gratification is often painful, but pain is fleeting. It is the deeper scars - from realizing that one's favorite colorful animations are not real - that may never heal.
withdrawal_symptoms.zhcn_modifier:

unity_reduction_diplomatic_18.zhcn_desc: 由于一直以来视若珍宝的传说被揭穿，人民的文化认同遭到了损害。
unity_reduction_diplomatic_18.en_desc: The population's cultural identity has been wounded by the debunking of some of their most treasured legends.

unity_reduction_akx_9541.zhcn_desc: 国民已对其领袖失去信心，终日活在可能遭受相同命运的恐惧之中。
unity_reduction_akx_9541.en_desc: The citizens have lost faith in their leaders, and now live in fear that a similar fate could befall them.

unity_reduction_observation_47.zhcn_desc: 其他国家公开处决了我们自己的数名科学家，使得我们的民心受到了动摇。
unity_reduction_observation_47.en_desc: The public execution of several of our scientists, by a nation state, has shaken our citizens.

unity_reduction_crisis_2204.zhcn_desc: 我们的人民正对政府保护民众安全的能力失去信心。
unity_reduction_crisis_2204.en_desc: Our people are losing faith in the government's ability to protect them.

unity_reduction_utopia_30.zhcn_desc: 公民们对我们无视独眼漫步者遭受其他帝国非难而致盲时的无动于衷感到失望。
unity_reduction_utopia_30.en_desc: The citizens are disappointed that we turned a blind eye when another empire blinded the formerly one-eyed Wanderer.

unity_increase_utopia_30.zhcn_desc: 我们维护了我们人民的利益，并要求对方国家因为破坏我们的独眼漫步者星座支付了赔偿。
unity_increase_utopia_30.en_desc: We looked out for the interests of our people and demanded due payment for the damage done to the star constellation the One-eyed Wanderer.

shroud_cooldown.zhcn_desc: 通灵者集会所刚从上一次对虚境的远征返回并正在回复力量。目前他们的灵能还不足以发起下一次远征。
shroud_cooldown.en_desc: The Conclave of Telepaths is still in the process of recovering from their last expedition into the Shroud. As yet, they lack the psionic strength to mount another.

shroud_precog_cooldown.zhcn_desc: 通灵者集会所上次逗留在虚境时，许多强大的成员因陷入疯狂而损失。他们现在还未召集满人手。
shroud_precog_cooldown.en_desc: The Conclave of Telepaths lost many of their most powerful members to madness during their last sojourn into the Shroud. They have yet to fully replenish their numbers.

shroud_happiness.zhcn_desc: 神秘的虚境赐予了我们一个暂时的恩赐。
shroud_happiness.en_desc: The enigmatic Shroud has granted us a temporary boon.

covenant_whisperers_in_the_void.en_desc: We have formed a Covenant with a powerful being in the Shroud and now benefit from its patronage.\n\n§YThere will be a price to pay.§!

covenant_shroud_marked.en_desc: This world is marked by the Shroud.\n\n§RSomething very bad is going to happen here.§!

research_utopia_60.zhcn_desc: 神经库的发明可以显著提高我们的工程科技研究速度。
research_utopia_60.en_desc: The invention of a neural bank has allowed us to improve our engineering research speed.

energy_utopia_57.zhcn_desc: 一个如同奇迹一般的抗衰老药膏正供不应求。
energy_utopia_57.en_desc: Our new miracle anti-aging cream is in demand.

minor_terrorist_action.zhcn_desc: 由于§H不满§!所引起的恐怖袭击让殖民地居民产生严重不安，甚至对对当地政府失去了信心。
minor_terrorist_action.en_desc: §HUnrest§! on this colony caused Pops to be victimized in a terror attack and lose faith in the regime.

major_terrorist_action.zhcn_desc: 由于§H不满§!所引起的恐怖袭击让殖民地居民产生严重不安，甚至对对当地政府失去了信心。
major_terrorist_action.en_desc: §HUnrest§! on this colony caused Pops to be victimized in a terror attack and lose faith in the regime.

riots_averted.zhcn_desc: 尽管该殖民地有着十分高的§H不满§!，但人们依然众志成城，阻止暴力升级。
riots_averted.en_desc: Despite high §HUnrest§!, Pops on this colony banded together to prevent further violence.

spiritualist_unrest.zhcn_desc: 该殖民地的§H不满§!使当地居民开始投向§Y唯心主义者§!势力。
spiritualist_unrest.en_desc: §HUnrest§! on this colony has caused local Pops to become more attracted to §YSpiritualism§!.

xenophile_unrest.zhcn_desc: 该殖民地的§H不满§!使当地居民开始投向§Y亲外主义者§!势力。

adding_unrest_slaves.zhcn_desc: 激进的奴隶们正在聚集，散布着不安的气息。
adding_unrest_slaves.en_desc: Radical slave elements are rallying, spreading unrest.

revolt_suppressed.zhcn_desc: 一段时间内，奴隶们不会聚众闹事了。
revolt_suppressed.en_desc: The slaves will not dare to reconsolidate anytime soon.

revolt_suppressed_2.zhcn_desc: 叛军暂时是不敢再造次了。
revolt_suppressed_2.en_desc: The rebels will not dare to reconsolidate anytime soon.

slave_hunger_strike.zhcn_desc: 当你备受饥饿的煎熬时，你很难专心工作。
slave_hunger_strike.en_desc: It's hard to work when you're doubled over from hunger pangs.

slave_riots.zhcn_desc: 奴隶的暴动阻碍了人口的增长。

slaves_defected.zhcn_desc: 从前的奴隶能够成为国家的一员，他们很高兴。
slaves_defected.en_desc: The former slaves are pleased to be a part of our nation.

free_at_last.zhcn_desc: 前奴隶终于从他们的压迫者手中获得了自由。
free_at_last.en_desc: The former slaves are finally free from their oppressors.

insurgents_free.zhcn_desc: 最终，叛乱者从占领国的暴政中解脱出来了。
insurgents_free.en_desc: At last the rebels are free from the tyranny of the occupying power.

pop_disappearances.zhcn_desc: 神秘失踪事件令整个星球的居民变得不安。
pop_disappearances.en_desc: A wave of mysterious disappearances is causing planetwide unrest.

船体值：§G+250000§!
每日护盾再生：§G+500§!
