舰船武器射速：§G+600%§!

whisperers_madness.zhcn_desc: §Y虚空之低语§!带来了疯狂，这个星球的人口正在暴动。
whisperers_madness.en_desc: The population of this world is rioting as a result of madness brought on by the §YWhisperers in the Void§!.

whisperers_psychosis.zhcn_desc: §Y虚空之低语§!带来了疯狂，这个世界完全陷入了无政府状态。
whisperers_psychosis.en_desc: This planet is in complete anarchy as a result of madness brought on by the §YWhisperers in the Void§!.

eater_unhappiness_planet_1.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的一部分人口被§Y世界之喰煞§!吞噬了。
eater_unhappiness_planet_1.en_desc: A part of this planet's population was devoured by the §YEater of Worlds§!.

eater_unhappiness_planet_2.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的一部分人口被§Y世界之喰煞§!吞噬了。
eater_unhappiness_planet_2.en_desc: A part of this planet's population was devoured by the §YEater of Worlds§!.

eater_unhappiness_empire.zhcn_desc: 我们帝国境内一整颗行星被§Y世界之喰煞§!吞噬了。
eater_unhappiness_empire.en_desc: An entire planet in our empire was devoured by the §YEater of Worlds§!.

instrument_consumer_goods.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的人民开始堕落为消费主义者，渴求高级食材和异域货物。毫无疑问这是§Y渴求之器具§!的所作所为。
instrument_consumer_goods.en_desc: The population of this planet has turned to decadent consumerism, desperate for exclusive foods and exotic wares. This is undoubtedly the doing of the §YInstrument of Desire§!.

instrument_deviance_planet.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上的人口正背离帝国的道德并追求着他们各自的目的。毫无疑问这是§Y渴求之器具§!的所作所为。
instrument_deviance_planet.en_desc: The population of this planet is turning away from our empire's ethics to pursue their own goals. This is undoubtedly the doing of the §YInstrument of Desire§!.

instrument_deviance_empire.zhcn_desc: 整个帝国的人口开始质疑帝国的理念和政策。毫无疑问这是§Y渴求之器具§!的所作所为。
instrument_deviance_empire.en_desc: The population of our entire empire has begun to question our empire's ethics and policies. This is undoubtedly the doing of the §YInstrument of Desire§!.

master_builders_habitats.zhcn_desc: 此轨道居住站已额外扩张了§Y2§!个最大区划数。
master_builders_habitats.en_desc: This Orbital Habitat has been expanded by an additional §Y2§! Max Districts.

satrapy_of_horde.zhcn_desc: 身为辖地，我们必须从成员中选出一些新兵提供给大可汗。
satrapy_of_horde.en_desc: As a Satrapy, we are obligated to supply the Great Khan with a certain amount of military recruits from among our population.

god_rayed.zhcn_desc: 神之光的效果萦绕在大气层，土壤，以及当地动植物之间。
god_rayed.en_desc: The effects of the Divine Enforcer linger in the atmosphere, the soil, the local flora and fauna.

neutron_bombarded.zhcn_desc: 该星球的生态系统仍处于中子灭杀的毁灭打击后的恢复过程中。
neutron_bombarded.en_desc: The ecosystem of the planet is still recovering from the devastating effects of a Neutron Sweep.

uneasy_faith.zhcn_desc: 民众已经在某种程度上意识到他们的信仰并不完全是发自内心的。
uneasy_faith.en_desc: The populace is on some level aware that the fervor of their faith is not wholly their own.

jump_drive_cooldown.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器伤害：§R-50%§!\n亚光速航速：§R-50%§!

colossus_victim.zhcn_desc: 巨像攻击造成的对全国民众的心灵创伤引发了全民意识形态转变。
colossus_victim.en_desc: The national trauma of the Colossus attack manifests in ideological shifts across broad demographics.
colossus_victim.zhcn_modifier: 军国主义思潮吸引力：§G+50%§!\n排外主义思潮吸引力：§G+50%§!

holy_player_planet.zhcn_desc: 这个星球尚未被智慧生物玷污，被人视作圣地。
holy_player_planet.en_desc: This planet is unspoiled by sapient life and considered sacred.

has_holy_player_planet.zhcn_desc: 我们已将境内一个未被殖民的星球视为圣地。
has_holy_player_planet.en_desc: We have designated an uninhabited world within our borders as a holy place.

rummy_nebula.zhcn_desc: 我们发现了一颗气态巨行星，它包含上万亿公升的酯，其成分与我们祖先数千年来一直酿造的酒精饮料相同。人们为此而欢呼雀跃。
rummy_nebula.en_desc: The discovery of a gas giant possessing billions upon billions of liters of an ester identical to one distilled into inebriants by our ancestors for thousands of years has led to widespread gaiety among our citizens.
rummy_nebula.zhcn_modifier:
幸福度：§G+10%§!
每月影响力：§G+33%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-5%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§R-5%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§R-5%§!

frozen_in_time.zhcn_desc: 这些是一个失落文明的残骸，当超强耀斑耗尽了星球大气层时像烛火一样被掐灭了。
frozen_in_time.en_desc: There are remnants of a lost civilization on this planet, snuffed out like a candle when solar superflares depleted the planet's atmosphere.

superflare_star.zhcn_desc: 这颗恒星偶尔会射出超强耀斑，向星系中喷发大量等离子。
superflare_star.en_desc: This star exhibits occasional superflares, ejecting huge quantities of plasma into the system.

superflare_planet.zhcn_desc: 我们知道这颗星球的恒星会喷发超强耀斑，可能会对星球表面的生命与电子器件带来有害影响。
superflare_planet.en_desc: This planet's sun is known to exhibit massive superflares, which may have adverse effects for life and electronics on the planet's surface.

superflare_struck.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球受到了超强耀斑的影响，导致辐射水平上升以及电子器件受到干扰。
superflare_struck.en_desc: This planet has been affected by a solar superflare, resulting in increased radiation levels and electronic interference.
superflare_struck.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§R-15%§!

superflare_avoided.zhcn_desc: 这座星球的人们受到防护，免受超强耀斑活动的负面影响。
superflare_avoided.en_desc: This planet's populace is shielded from the harmful effects of its sun's superflare activity.
superflare_avoided.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£unity£ 凝聚力：§G+10%§!

black_hole_hologram.zhcn_desc: 一支神秘的舰队进入了这个黑洞的视界线，外界观测者只能看到它们在表面上留下的永远的身影。
black_hole_hologram.en_desc: A mysterious fleet entered this black hole's event horizon, leaving their image forever suspended on its surface for outside observers.

black_hole_energy.zhcn_desc: 围绕这座黑洞的吸积盘具有很高的电荷，产生了大量静电能源。
black_hole_energy.en_desc: The accretion disk surrounding this black hole is highly charged, generating significant quantities of electrostatic energy.

primitive_robots.zhcn_desc: 这座星球上仍有初级机器人在活动，而创造它们的文明早已消逝。
primitive_robots.en_desc: There are ancient robots still functioning on this planet, left behind when the civilization that created them perished.

researcher_rage.zhcn_desc: 一种会使感染者混乱并产生侵略性的神经病毒，使这颗星球上的社会科学家蒙受了损失。
researcher_rage.en_desc: A neurological virus causing confusion and aggression in infected patients has decimated the ranks of our societal researchers on this planet.
researcher_rage.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§R-50%§!

clones_in_cryo.zhcn_desc: 在环绕这颗恒星的废弃星环世界上，有成百上千个克隆体封存在冷冻舱中。
clones_in_cryo.en_desc: There are hundreds of clones sealed in cryostasis chambers on the ruined Ring World surrounding this star.

dead_god.zhcn_desc: 这颗月球的表面上有一只未知巨大外星生物的遗骸。
dead_god.en_desc: The enormous corpse of an unidentified alien creature rests upon the surface of this moon.

dead_god_planet.zhcn_desc: 某种巨型外星生物的遗骸默默地在轨道上守望着这颗星球。
dead_god_planet.en_desc: The corpse of some gargantuan alien creature keeps silent vigil in orbit over this planet.

dead_god_planet_hidden.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的有机生命正受到某种神秘现象的影响。
dead_god_planet_hidden.en_desc: Organic lifeforms on this planet are being affected by some yet-unexplained phenomenon.

life_electric.zhcn_desc: 一个活动的电脉冲网络交织在这颗小行星的表面上。
life_electric.en_desc: A living network of electrical impulses crisscrosses the surface of this planetoid.

soothing_crystals.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球地壳构造中共鸣水晶的频率，对我们种族具有医疗效果。
soothing_crystals.en_desc: The resonant crystals that line this planet's tectonic crust resonate at a medically therapeutic frequency for our species.
soothing_crystals.zhcn_modifier: 主流思潮吸引力：§G+33%§!\n幸福度：§G+10%§!

good_vibrations.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的磁场共鸣频率对我们的神经网络非常有益。
good_vibrations.en_desc: This planet's magnetosphere resonates at a frequency very conducive to our neural network.
good_vibrations.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£unity£ 凝聚力：§G+50%§!

exofungus.zhcn_desc: 一种可在极端环境繁殖的外来真菌像癌细胞一般疯狂扩散，覆盖了地貌。
exofungus.en_desc: An extremophilic exofungus spreads on this planet like a cancer, choking the terrain.
exofungus.zhcn_modifier: 星球建造速度：§R-20%§!\n宜居性：§R-10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+33%§!

watery_grave.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的海面下存在某种类人猿集体的遗迹，从南极一路延伸至北极。
watery_grave.en_desc: The ruins of an ancient arthropoid collective stretch from pole to pole on this planet, long-buried beneath its waves.
watery_grave.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+30%§!

brainslug_woes.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的人们怀疑其同胞们选择与神经蛞蝓共生。
brainslug_woes.en_desc: This planet's populace has misgivings about their fellow colonists choosing to enter into symbiotic union with neural slugs.

brainslug_woes_phobe.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的人们怀疑其同胞们选择与神经蛞蝓共生。
brainslug_woes_phobe.en_desc: This planet's populace has misgivings about their fellow colonists choosing to enter into symbiotic union with neural slugs.

predatory_plants.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上到处都是凶恶的巨型植物，给了我们研究的机会，但对居民来说也是个危险的阻碍。
predatory_plants.en_desc: Vicious megaflora dominates this planet's landscape, creating opportunities for research, but also dangerous obstacles for any inhabitants.
predatory_plants.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-10%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!

living_sea.zhcn_desc: 尽管我们尚未得知这颗星球的海洋的本质，但不知为何，它毫无疑问是活的。思维，幻觉，以及冲动像柔和的歌声一般，在任何与其接触的有机生命的脑海中翩翩起舞。
living_sea.en_desc: Though the nature of this planet's sea eludes us, it is somehow, unquestionably, alive. Thoughts, visions, and impulses like soft songs dance in the minds of organic beings who come into contact with it.
living_sea.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§G+25%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+10%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+10%§!
主流思潮吸引力：§R-25%§!
星球建造速度：§R-25%§!

phaseshifted.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球定期在维度之间转移，反复从一颗§Y虚境星球§!与一颗§Y盖亚星球§!之间来回变换。当这种转移发生时，上面的居民会发生什么事仍不得而知。
phaseshifted.en_desc: This planet shifts between dimensions on a regular period: transforming from a §YShrouded World§! to a §YGaia World§! and back again. It is unknown what might happen to any settlers on its surface when such a shift occurs.

building_blocks.zhcn_desc: 这个行星上充满了对碳素生命体和氨素生命体至关重要的大气和分子，虽然行星地表上没有发现有机生命体，但这个星球毫无疑问是培育有机生命的最佳地点。
building_blocks.en_desc: This planet is rife with gases and molecules believed to comprise crucial components and conditions for carbon- and ammonia-based lifeforms. Though no actual living organisms have been found on its surface, it may be a perfect crucible for the gradual emergence of biological life.

nanite_network.zhcn_desc: 来自这个星系的小行星带中一个被封锁的原子钟的一群纳米机器人在这里建造了一个目的不明的计算网络。
nanite_network.en_desc: A computational network of unknown purpose was constructed here by a stream of nanites that emerged from a sealed atomic clock found in the system's asteroid belt.

erratic_behavior.zhcn_desc: 该人员正在表现出奇怪且有时的行为。
erratic_behavior.en_desc: This population is exhibiting strange, sometimes violent behavior.
erratic_behavior.zhcn_modifier: 幸福度：§R-25%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的资源：§R-25%§!\n主流思潮吸引力：§R-25%§!

conviction.zhcn_desc: 该成员坚信我们是重生之圣者的信使。因此，他们非常渴望能够取悦我们。
conviction.en_desc: This population believes us to be messengers from their god of rebirth. As such, their eagerness to please us is remarkable.
conviction.zhcn_modifier: 幸福度：§G+33%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的资源：§G+25%§!

big_friendly_warform_power.zhcn_desc: 以其尺寸而言，这艘机器人战舰的外壳非常坚固。
big_friendly_warform_power.en_desc: The robotic warship's construction boasts an unusually resilient hull for its size.

scavenger_weak_points.zhcn_desc: 拾荒者并非按照任何明确的现成图纸而造。因此，其摇摇欲坠的构造中包含一些结构弱点。任何知晓这些弱点的舰队都可以利用它们。
scavenger_weak_points.en_desc: The Scavenger was not built on any pre-engineered design. As a result, its ramshackle construction contains a number of structural weaknesses. Any fleet made aware of them could exploit this.
scavenger_weak_points.zhcn_modifier: 对拾荒者机器人的伤害：§G+25%§!

elderly_tiyanki_weak_points.zhcn_desc: 远古缇扬奇女族长的甲壳上有个弱点，就是一枚镶入其外皮中的尚未爆炸的巨型质子鱼雷。我们的舰队知道该如何引爆它。
elderly_tiyanki_weak_points.en_desc: There is a chink in the ancient Tiyanki Matriarch's armor, in the form of a massive unexploded proton torpedo lodged in her hide. Our fleets know how to detonate it.
elderly_tiyanki_weak_points.zhcn_modifier: 对缇扬奇女族长的伤害：§G+25%§!

ahab_power.zhcn_modifier: 船体值：§G+400%§!\n舰船武器伤害：§G+300%§!\n舰船武器射速：§G+20%§!

paradise_planet.zhcn_desc: 一个仿佛仙境般的美丽世界。
paradise_planet.en_desc: A paradisaical world of unparalleled beauty.
paradise_planet.zhcn_modifier:
幸福度：§G+10%§!

ancient_harvesters.zhcn_desc: 太阳能动力的远古收割机在协助收割星球上的庄稼。
ancient_harvesters.en_desc: Ancient solar-powered harvesters assist in gathering the planet's crops.

seismological_phenomena.zhcn_desc: 该星球受到异常地震现象的影响。
seismological_phenomena.en_desc: This world is afflicted by abnormal seismological phenomena.
seismological_phenomena.zhcn_modifier:

seismological_phenomena_2.zhcn_desc: 该星球受到异常地震现象的影响。
seismological_phenomena_2.en_desc: This world is afflicted by abnormal seismological phenomena.
seismological_phenomena_2.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§R-20%§!
幸福度：§R-15%§!
人口增长速度：§R-20%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!

egg_rifts.zhcn_desc: 剧毒黏液与气体不断从星球表面的裂隙中渗出。整个星球上都弥漫着一股臭鸡蛋的味道。
egg_rifts.en_desc: Toxic slime and gases seep from the deep rifts stretching across the planet's surface. The entire planet reeks of rotten egg.
egg_rifts.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-5%§!\n幸福度：§R-5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!

enigmatic_cache_in_orbit.zhcn_desc: 只要那个神秘容器还在轨道上，我们的科学家就仍有充足的研究机会。
enigmatic_cache_in_orbit.en_desc: As long as the enigmatic cache remains in orbit our scientists will have ample opportunity for research.
enigmatic_cache_in_orbit.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§G+30%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+30%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£engineering_research£ 工程学研究：§G+30%§!

enigmatic_cache_in_orbit_phobe.zhcn_desc: 位于轨道上的那恶心的外星装置一日不除，我们的人民就一日无法安稳。
enigmatic_cache_in_orbit_phobe.en_desc: Our citizens will not get a full night's sleep as long as that wretched alien contraption remains in orbit.

enigmatic_fatigue.zhcn_desc: 我们的人口受到由催眠教学法引发的疲劳的影响。
enigmatic_fatigue.en_desc: Our pops are affected by hypnopedia-induced fatigue.

enigmatic_sadness.zhcn_desc: 我们的人口正在适应由高于平均水准的智能水平带来的副作用。
enigmatic_sadness.en_desc: Our pops are acclimatizing to the side-effects of an above-average intelligence.

enigmatic_madness.zhcn_desc: 这个人口依旧被不成功的提升过程带来的持续性噩梦所困扰。
enigmatic_madness.en_desc: This pop is still tortured by lingering nightmares from an unsuccessful uplifting.

enigmatic_slumber.zhcn_desc: 这个生物陷入了催眠教学所导致的昏迷状态。
enigmatic_slumber.en_desc: This pop has been trapped in a hypnopedia-induced coma.

in_paradise.zhcn_desc: 我们的公民为成功殖民天堂星球而欢呼。
in_paradise.en_desc: Our citizens rejoice now that we have finally colonized the paradisaical planet Paridayda.

littering_loitering_liability.zhcn_name: 一个游手好闲并乱丢垃圾的不利因素

a_hitchikers_guide_to_the_galaxy.zhcn_desc: 一本外星银河系漫游指南激发了人们对未知的热爱。
a_hitchikers_guide_to_the_galaxy.en_name: An Alien Guide to the Galaxy
a_hitchikers_guide_to_the_galaxy.en_desc: An alien hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy has inspired our people's love for the unknown.

dessanu_gift.zhcn_modifier:
每月£sr_living_metal£ 活体金属：§G+1§!
每月£rare_crystals£稀有水晶：§G+1§!
每月£exotic_gases£异星天然气：§G+1§!
每月£volatile_motes£易爆微粒：§G+1§!

curator_buff_hatchling.zhcn_desc: 我们听从了策展人的建议，在我们舰体外部加了一层防护型涂层，用于保护飞船不受虚空恶兽那腐蚀性唾液和尖刺的伤害。
curator_buff_hatchling.en_desc: Heeding the Curators' advice, we have covered our ships in a coating that will protect them from the Voidspawn's corrosive spittle and spikes.

mineral_mapping.zhcn_desc: 可以高速勘探地下地形并探明其所含矿物的系统。
mineral_mapping.en_desc: A system enabling us to quickly chart underground terrain and accurately map mineral veins.

disregard_for_alien_life.zhcn_desc: 用恶劣的态度对待外星生命，漠视任何外星生命形式和星系的物种多样性。
disregard_for_alien_life.en_desc: Acted in a manner ill befitting a xenophile, with no regard for alien life and the biodiversity of the galaxy.

gray_warship.zhcn_modifier:
护盾承受值：§G+80%§!
舰船武器伤害：§G+80%§!
舰船武器射速：§G+80%§!
船体值：§G+80%§!
亚光速航速：§G+50%§!
每日船体再生：§G+4§!
每日装甲再生：§G+6§!

gray_scattered.zhcn_desc: 小灰已被击溃，目前正在缓慢地重新恢复成一个单独的个体。
gray_scattered.en_desc: Gray has been scattered and is in the process of slowly merging back together into a single form.

extended_payout_goodest.zhcn_modifier: 每月£minerals£ 矿物：§G+40§!\n每月£energy£ 能量币：§G+40§!

extended_payout_good.zhcn_modifier: 每月£minerals£ 矿物：§G+6§!\n每月£energy£ 能量币：§G+6§!

galatron_modifier.zhcn_modifier: 每月影响力：§G+2§!\n每月凝聚力：§G+2§!

ancient_trade_route.zhcn_desc: 对远古贸易路线图的解密显示此地的进口贸易比最初预想的更加繁荣。
ancient_trade_route.en_desc: The deciphering of ancient trade route charts have revealed this place to be of greater mercantile import than first assumed.

bunkbeds_deployed.zhcn_name: §H范格利集团§!：已部署双层床铺
bunkbeds_deployed.zhcn_desc: 高效的范格利牌可堆叠睡眠箱可以降低这个星球的住房需求。
bunkbeds_deployed.en_desc: Efficient Trium-brand stackable sleep enclosures reduce housing needs on this world.

tupperware_deployed.zhcn_name: §H范格利集团§!：已部署食品保鲜容器
tupperware_deployed.zhcn_desc: 使用范格利牌食品容器可降低这颗星球上的食物浪费。
tupperware_deployed.en_desc: The use of Trium-brand food storage containers reduce food waste on this world.

atmospheric_deodorizer_deployed.zhcn_name: §H范格利集团§!：大气层除臭器已部署
atmospheric_deodorizer_deployed.zhcn_desc: 大气层清洗器可使这颗星球的空气如薄荷般清新。
atmospheric_deodorizer_deployed.en_desc: Atmospheric scrubbers lend the air on this planet a quality of minty freshness.
atmospheric_deodorizer_deployed.zhcn_modifier: 迁入吸引力：§G+30%§!\n迁入导致的人口增长：§G+10%§!

racket_energy_extractor.zhcn_desc: 拉奇工业公司生产的一种奥术工程卫星正在环绕该天体，提升了从天体表面开采能源的可能性。
racket_energy_extractor.en_desc: A satellite of arcane engineering created by the Racket Industrial Enterprise hangs in orbit of this astral body, heightening possibilities for energy extraction from its surface.

racket_generator_regulator.zhcn_desc: 这些拉奇工业公司的拉奇牌发电机调节器能够提升我们的科技无人机的兼容性，让它们能够以微秒级的水平进行发电作业。
racket_generator_regulator.en_desc: These Racket Industrial Enterprise-brand Generator Regulators help fine-tune the compatibility of our Tech-Drones to Generator District electric grids down to the microsecond.
racket_generator_regulator.zhcn_modifier: £job_technician£ 技工生产的£energy£ 能量币：§G+25%§!

contingency_sabotage.zhcn_desc: 肃正协议破坏了这颗行星上的发电厂区划。
contingency_sabotage.en_desc: The Contingency has sabotaged the Generator Districts on this planet.
contingency_sabotage.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§R-20%§!

vengralian_sales_contingent.zhcn_name: §H范格利集团§!：范格利销售团队
vengralian_sales_contingent.zhcn_desc: 来自范格利集团的销售骨干们正在增加我们所有贸易路线的贸易额。
vengralian_sales_contingent.en_desc: A cadre of elite Vengralian Trium sales agents are boosting Trade Value across all our trade routes.

6monthsocietycost.zhcn_name: §H范格利集团§!：范格利集团发票
6monthsocietycost.zhcn_desc: 我们正在偿还欠范格利集团的债务。
6monthsocietycost.en_desc: We are paying off a debt to the Vengralian Trium.

galactic_market_founder.zhcn_desc: 泛星系贸易市场空间站坐落于此。

criminal_underworld.zhcn_desc: 这个星球是一个大型黑社会组织的老巢。
criminal_underworld.en_desc: This world is home to a large criminal underworld.
criminal_underworld.zhcn_modifier: 犯罪度：§R+15§!\n罪犯岗位：§R+1§!\n每$VALUE$行星犯罪度§G+1§!个罪犯岗位：§R+3%§!

drone_deviancy.zhcn_desc: 这个星球存在着一个大型反常子人口社群，该社群已不再听从蜂巢思维的指令。
drone_deviancy.en_desc: This world is home to large communities of deviant drones, who no longer respond to commands from the Hive Mind.
drone_deviancy.zhcn_modifier: 反常度：§G+15§!\n反常工蜂岗位：§R+1§!\n每$VALUE$行星犯罪度§G+1§!个反常工蜂岗位：§R+3%§!

drone_corruption.zhcn_desc: 此行星上存在着数个反常与腐化无人机的网络，这些无人机的运行不受核心智能的限制。
drone_corruption.en_desc: This world is home to several networks of deviant and corrupted drone units, who operate outside the established parameters set by the core intelligence.
drone_corruption.zhcn_modifier: 反常度：§G+15§!\n腐化无人机岗位：§R+1§!\n每$VALUE$行星犯罪度§G+1§!个腐化无人机岗位：§R+3%§!

gang_wars.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上正在发生着一场两个或以上犯罪组织之间的帮派战争，伤亡情况十分惨烈。帮派之间爆发出激烈地斗争，而当地的警察安保队伍因此深陷泥沼。
gang_wars.en_desc: This world is currently in the middle of a very destructive gang war between two or more organized crime factions. Heavy fighting is ongoing between the rivalling gangs, with local security forces trapped in the middle.

center_of_drug_trade.zhcn_desc: 这个世界已经成为了毒品交易的中心。每天都有大量违禁药品被运送经过这个行星，而其居民也有不少已经染上了毒瘾。
center_of_drug_trade.en_desc: This world has become a major center of drug trade. Illegal narcotics are being smuggled planetside on a daily basis, with a large segment of the populace being regular users.

mob_rule.zhcn_desc: 这个星球目前已经被一个黑社会组织所完全掌控了。他们充斥在社会的每一个阶层，掌控着星球的每一个角落。
mob_rule.en_desc: This world is currently dominated by a single criminal organization. They have infiltrated all layers of society, and little happens here without their involvement or permission.

bribed_officials.zhcn_desc: 这个世界中的几名高官最近被发现收取了当地犯罪组织的贿赂。
bribed_officials.en_desc: Several high-ranking officials on this world were recently discovered to have been in the pay of local criminal organizations.

substance_abuse.zhcn_desc: 高成瘾性危险药物的滥用充斥着这个星球。
substance_abuse.en_desc: The illegal use of dangerous and highly addictive drugs is widespread on this world.

smuggler_activity.zhcn_desc: 这个世界的走私活动日渐增加，以至于对此处的贸易盈利造成了负面影响。
smuggler_activity.en_desc: An increase in smuggler activity on this world has had a negative impact on profits from trade.

crime_wave.zhcn_desc: 这个世界正面临一场犯罪狂潮。
crime_wave.en_desc: This world is currently experiencing a crime wave.

travel_advisory.zhcn_desc: 这个世界的帮派战争十分激烈，不少地区都对希望来此的人提出旅行警告建议，这大大减少了前来此处进行买卖的商人。
travel_advisory.en_desc: The violent gang warfare on this world has led to a travel advisory which has greatly diminished the number of visiting traders.

cartel_war.zhcn_desc: 这个世界的贩毒团伙十分猖狂，正在进行争夺领地的低强度战争。
cartel_war.en_desc: The powerful drug cartels that have carved up this world between themselves are currently fighting a low-intensity war.

protection_racket.zhcn_desc: 统治这个世界的黑社会组织在到处收取保护费。
protection_racket.en_desc: The mobsters who rule this world have implemented an extensive protection racket.

corrupt_administration.zhcn_desc: 最近揭露了这个星球政府的大部分成员都已经被星球上最大的犯罪组织收买。
corrupt_administration.en_desc: The vast majority of this world's planetary administration was recently revealed to have been in the employ of its dominant crime syndicate.

trade_pilfering.zhcn_desc: 统治这个世界的犯罪组织通过中间人控制了部分航空港。因此当地贸易的很大一部分都要通过他们经手。
trade_pilfering.en_desc: The gangster syndicate ruling this world has assumed control over several spaceports through intermediaries. A large portion of local trade now has to go through them.

crime_boss_arrested.zhcn_desc: 这个行星上的一个重要的犯罪头目最近被逮捕了，使得整个犯罪组织都濒临瘫痪。
crime_boss_arrested.en_desc: An important crime boss was recently arrested on this world, crippling a major criminal organization.

deviant_interference.zhcn_desc: 叛乱子人口正在骚扰我们在此行星上的设施的运作。
deviant_interference.en_desc: Deviant drones are interfering with our facilities on this world.

drone_signal_interference.zhcn_desc: 此行星上的腐化无人机网络所散播的信号正在干扰我们的忠诚单位的正常运作。
drone_signal_interference.en_desc: Signals from the corrupted drone networks on this world are interfering with the functionality of our loyal units.

ringleader_killed.zhcn_desc: 此行星上的某位地位极高的叛乱分子帮派首领被消灭了。
ringleader_killed.en_desc: An important ringleader among the deviant drones on this world was recently terminated.

corrupt_network_terminated.zhcn_desc: 最近有一种病毒终结了此行星上的腐败子人口网络。
corrupt_network_terminated.en_desc: A virus recently terminated one of the corrupt drone networks on this world.

anticrime_campaign.zhcn_desc: 该星球的执法者们正在进行大型扫黑除恶行动。
anticrime_campaign.en_desc: The Enforcers on this world are currently conducting an extensive crime prevention campaign.
anticrime_campaign.zhcn_modifier: 每位执法者提供的犯罪率下降：§G+10§!\n执法者维护费：§R+2§!£energy£

crime_lord_deal.zhcn_desc: 这个世界的当局权威目前与犯罪头目们达成了某种“共识”来避免犯罪组织可能造成的最坏情况。
crime_lord_deal.en_desc: The legal authorities on this world currently have a "mutual understanding" with the leading crime lords to prevent the worst excesses of their organizations.

crime_lord_deal_broken.zhcn_name: 与犯罪头目的协议已终止
crime_lord_deal_broken.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球上的政府已经终止了与主要犯罪头目的交易，使黑社会与执法部门之间陷入混乱。
crime_lord_deal_broken.en_desc: The authorities on this world have broken their deal with the leading crime lords, casting the criminal underworld and law enforcement into chaos.

unemployment_benefits.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上失业人员获取的福利补助暂时提升。
unemployment_benefits.en_desc: Benefits for the unemployed have been temporarily increased on this world.
unemployment_benefits.zhcn_modifier: 失业人口消费品维持费：§G+2§!

activity_program.zhcn_desc: 此行星启用了昂贵的活动计划，可以有效防止无业和闲置的工蜂变得反常。
activity_program.en_desc: An expensive activity program has been implemented on this world to prevent unemployed and idle drones from turning to deviancy.
activity_program.zhcn_modifier: 拾荒工蜂将需要额外的1£food£。

standby_mode.zhcn_desc: 此行星上的所有无业和闲置的无人机都会进入待命模式以防止腐化和反常程序的出现，不过此模式会增加人口维护费用。
standby_mode.en_desc: All unemployed and idle drone units on this world have been put into standby mode to prevent them from developing corrupt and deviant programming, increasing their maintenance costs.

spawn_pool_stimulants.en_desc: A gentle blend of corticosteroids and adrenal hormones to help ease the passage of young into adulthood.

numistic_magnetostrips.zhcn_desc: 由拜金教团打造，这些磁条将部署在我们行星周围的单位上，让他们与行星磁层同调。 这可以使他们的离子排列整齐，降低他们的能源需求。
numistic_magnetostrips.en_desc: Created by The Numistic Order, these strips are applied to our planetside units, tuning them to planet's magnetosphere. The process helps align their ions, thereby lowering their energy upkeep needs.

planet_culture_shock.zhcn_desc: 因为先进科技的突然出现，这一原本原始的世界无法立即适应，导致了一场混乱的动荡。在许多偏远区域仍旧存在着大量抵抗这一变化的居民。
planet_culture_shock.en_desc: This formerly primitive world is undergoing a chaotic upheaval as it adapts to the abrupt introduction of advanced technology. There are still significant and disruptive holdouts in many isolated regions.
planet_culture_shock.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的资源：§R-33%§!\n稳定度：§R-20§!

martial_law.en_desc: This planet has been placed under martial law.

planet_food_boost.en_desc: This planet is currently encouraging growth via the generous distribution of proper nutrition.

planet_luxuries_boost.en_desc: The provision of amenities to the populace is being bolstered by way of a special distribution program, delivering luxury and consumer goods.

consecrated_quality_1.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球不太适合被祝圣。
consecrated_quality_1.en_desc: This is deemed a poor object of worship.

consecrated_quality_2.en_desc: This is deemed a suitable object of worship.

consecrated_quality_3.zhcn_desc: 这是一颗被祝幅的星球。
consecrated_quality_3.en_desc: This is deemed a most blessed planet.

consecrated_quality_4.zhcn_desc: 这是一颗完美无瑕的神圣星球。
consecrated_quality_4.en_desc: This planet is deemed an immaculate and sacrosanct place.

market_nominee_level_1.zhcn_name: 基础市场竞争力评分：§R弱§!
market_nominee_level_1.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被提名作为未来泛星系贸易市场空间站的星球基地。\n\n相对竞争力较§R低§!。
market_nominee_level_1.en_desc: This world has been nominated to serve as the planetary underpinnings of a future centralized Galactic Market station.\n\nIts relative standing is §RWeak§!.

market_nominee_level_2.zhcn_name: 基础市场竞争力评分：§Y中§!
market_nominee_level_2.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被提名作为未来泛星系贸易市场空间站的星球基地。\n\n相对竞争力§Y持平§!。
market_nominee_level_2.en_desc: This world has been nominated to serve as the planetary underpinnings of a future centralized Galactic Market station.\n\nIts relative standing is §YAdequate§!.

market_nominee_level_3.zhcn_name: 基础市场竞争力评分：§G强§!
market_nominee_level_3.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被提名作为未来泛星系贸易市场空间站的星球基地。\n\n相对竞争力较§G高§!。
market_nominee_level_3.en_desc: This world has been nominated to serve as the planetary underpinnings of a future centralized Galactic Market station.\n\nIts relative standing is §GStrong§!.

market_nominee_level_4.zhcn_name: 增强的市场竞争力评分：§G极强§!
market_nominee_level_4.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被提名作为未来泛星系贸易市场空间站的星球基地。\n\n它的相对竞争力为§G极强§!。
market_nominee_level_4.en_desc: This world has been nominated to serve as the planetary underpinnings of a future centralized Galactic Market station.\n\nIts relative standing is §GExceptional§!.

market_nominee_level_5.zhcn_name: 增强的市场竞争力评分：§G完美§!
market_nominee_level_5.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被提名作为未来泛星系贸易市场空间站的星球基地。\n\n它的相对竞争力为§G完美§!。
market_nominee_level_5.en_desc: This world has been nominated to serve as the planetary underpinnings of a future centralized Galactic Market station.\n\nIts relative standing is §GPerfect§!.

pm_study_the_sea.zhcn_desc: 一个低轨道研究小组正在研究这颗行星上奇怪的海洋。
pm_study_the_sea.en_desc: A low-orbit research team is currently studying the strange sea on this planet.

planet_population_control.zhcn_desc: 宣布执行人口增长限制。
planet_population_control.en_desc: A limit on population growth has been declared.
planet_population_control.zhcn_modifier: 稳定度：§R-5§!\n迁出推动力：§G+100§!§R星球上无人口增长§!

planet_population_control_gestalt.en_desc: Drone production has stopped for now.

planet_robot_assembly_control.zhcn_desc: 机器人，智能人以及合成人的组装目前已经停止。
planet_robot_assembly_control.en_desc: The assembly of Robot, Droid, and Synthetic Pops has ceased for now.
planet_robot_assembly_control.zhcn_modifier: 人口组装花费：§G-75%§!§R不能在这个星球上组装任何机器人，智能人或者是合成人。§!

planet_growth_discouraged.zhcn_desc: 这个星球已经实施了几项旨在控制人口增长的政策。
planet_growth_discouraged.en_desc: This world has implemented several measures designed to discourage population growth.
planet_growth_discouraged.zhcn_modifier:
人口增长减少：§R+75%§!
人口舒适度使用：§R+25%§!
人口维护费：§R+25%§!
迁出推动力：§G+100§!

planet_population_expelled.zhcn_desc: 作为减少人口拥挤的极端措施，这颗星球上的一大批人口最近被强制驱逐了。
planet_population_expelled.en_desc: As a drastic measure to reduce overcrowding, a large segment of this world's population was recently forcibly expelled.

mastery_of_nature.zhcn_desc: 我们的人民需要更多空间繁衍生息，所以我们就得创造空间。决不能让大自然阻挡我们的进步之路。
mastery_of_nature.en_desc: Our population requires room to grow, and so we shall make that room. Nature must not stand in the way of progress.

resort_colony.zhcn_desc: 此行星的生态环境被改造得几乎完美，包含有可完全自定义的环球气候系统，整个星球的设计都是为了提供多样化的休闲度假选择。
resort_colony.en_desc: Landscaped to perfection and featuring a fully customizable global weather control system, every facet of this world's design is devoted to providing a wide range of vacation options for citizens in need of relaxation.
resort_colony.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§G+100%§!
每$VALUE$个人口§G+1§!个职员岗位：§G+50%§!帝国其他殖民地：
舒适度：§G+15%§!
 迁入吸引力：§G+15%§!

penal_colony.zhcn_desc: 此行星是用来流放重罪罪犯的，他们会被关在劳改营中赎偿他们的罪过.对许多人来说，他们一生都无法赎清罪行。
penal_colony.en_desc: This world is filled with strictly controlled criminals, paying off their debt to society in labor camps. For many, the debt will never be repaid.
penal_colony.zhcn_modifier: 犯罪度：§R+100%§!\n迁入吸引力：§G+33%§!帝国其他殖民地：\n 犯罪度：§G-25%§!

slave_colony.zhcn_desc: 这座世界专为最大化其奴隶人口的生长率而设计。
slave_colony.en_desc: This world is purpose-built to maximize the growth rate of its enslaved population.

divine_algorithm.zhcn_desc: 奴玛女神的神圣算法目前正在这颗星球上生效。
divine_algorithm.en_desc: Numa's divine algorithm is currently active on this world.
divine_algorithm.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+10%§!\n技工子个体岗位：§G+1§!

criminal_gambling.zhcn_desc: 在将积蓄输光之后，他们急需新的资金来源。
criminal_gambling.en_desc: Having gambled away their savings, new funding sources are required.

festival_aftermath.zhcn_desc: 要从一场如此盛大的狂欢中冷静下来，想必会出现一定的社会动荡。
festival_aftermath.en_desc: While recovering from a party of sufficient magnitude, a certain amount of grouchiness is to be expected.

slot_machine_bounty.zhcn_desc: 最新最棒的老虎机现已推出，人们玩到根本停不下来！这些老虎机会控制人们的大脑，直到榨干他们的钱财为止。
slot_machine_bounty.en_desc: The latest, greatest slot machines have been unveiled and people just can't stop playing! Literally, the machines hijack the cerebral cortex until gambling quotas are met.

heavy_metal.zhcn_desc: 自从巨尸乐队事件以来，不知出于何种原因，在这颗星球上生产金属变得更加容易了。
heavy_metal.en_desc: Ever since the MegaCorpse incident it has just been somehow easier to create metal on this planet.

alloy_relic.zhcn_desc: 这个被放置于铸造厂内的神秘装置可以增加合金生产效率。
alloy_relic.en_desc: Placed in a foundry this mysterious device increases the efficiency of alloy production.

minerals_relic.zhcn_desc: 这台奇怪的机器可以设法将矿物从地里转移出来，而不会影响到周围的物质。
minerals_relic.en_desc: This strange machine can somehow summon minerals up out of the ground without affecting the surrounding material.

energy_relic.zhcn_desc: 如果把它装到一台足够大的发电机上，这件装置会用一种未知且似乎不可理喻的技术在正常产出的基础上再产生额外的能量。
energy_relic.en_desc: When added to a generator of sufficient size this device uses an unknown and seemingly impossible technique to create additional energy over and above the normal output.
energy_relic.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+10%§!

artist_monument_erected.zhcn_desc: 由艺术家联盟创作的一座令人振奋的艺术纪念碑正在这颗星球上展出。
artist_monument_erected.en_desc: A stirring art monument created by the Artisan Troupe is being exhibited on this planet.

energy_deficit.zhcn_desc: §R我们正受到$DEFICIT|E$影响，因为所使用的§H能源§!超出了产出量，而积蓄又全都用光了。§!
energy_deficit.en_desc: §ROur Empire is affected by $DEFICIT|E$ since we are spending more §HEnergy Credits§! than we are producing, and our reserves have run out.§!

护盾承受值：§R-75%§!

food_deficit.zhcn_modifier: 有机人口幸福度：§R-25%§!\n人口增长减少：§R+75%§!

来自£job£ 岗位的£physics_research£ 物理学研究：§R-50%§!

nanites_deficit.zhcn_modifier: 由于缺少纳米材料，转化生产进程已暂停。

drums_of_war.zhcn_modifier: 舰船武器伤害：§G+20%§!\n军国主义思潮吸引力：§G+25%§!

contingency_calculation.zhcn_desc: 这是从肃正协议最后一个机械星球的残骸里找到的独立的肃正主机核心。它可以大大加快我们建造机器人和巨构建筑的速度。
contingency_calculation.en_desc: An isolated Contingency Mainframe Core that was salvaged from the wreckage of their last Machine World. It can greatly speed up the process of building robots and megastructures.

tissue_growth_stimulants.zhcn_desc: 利用在失落的骸骨之城发现的基因物质，我们的科学家成功地创造了一种增加人口成长速度的刺激物。不幸的是，有些人并不喜欢这种主意——注射靠发掘早已死去的外星生物的病态骸骨研发的物质。
tissue_growth_stimulants.en_desc: Using genetic materials recovered from the fallen City of Bones, our scientists have been able to devise a stimulant for increased population growth speed. Unfortunately, some populations dislike the idea of being injected with a substance developed by exhuming the diseased bones of long-dead aliens.
tissue_growth_stimulants.zhcn_modifier: 人口增长速度：§G+10%§!\n幸福度：§R-10%§!\n稳定度：§R-5§!

explosive_fungifoam_housing.zhcn_name: 爆发增殖式真菌型住宅单元
explosive_fungifoam_housing.zhcn_desc: 通过对在骸骨之城中发现的古老病毒进行基因剪接，从而使其适应当地的真菌，我们的科研小组能够为机械单元建造快速扩展的住房模块。
explosive_fungifoam_housing.en_desc: By gene-tailoring the ancient virus found in the City of Bones, and adapting it to a local fungus, our scientific units were able to construct rapidly-expanding housing modules for machine unit housing.

pm_planetary_mechanocalibrator.zhcn_desc: 古老的C.A.R.E交互界面已经在这个星球上全功率运作——当然，使用了一些现代化的改进。
pm_planetary_mechanocalibrator.en_desc: The ancient C.A.R.E Interactive Interface is working at full capacity on this planet - with some modern improvements, of course.
pm_planetary_mechanocalibrator.zhcn_modifier: 来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+10%§!

proclaim_superiority.zhcn_desc: 我们更应该着眼于文明的未来，在故纸堆里我们学不到什么。
proclaim_superiority.en_desc: We are the future of civilization, there is nothing we can learn from the past.

planet_museum_exhibits.zhcn_desc: 陈列外星文物进行展出能够赋予我们博物馆新的活力。
planet_museum_exhibits.en_desc: The display of alien artifacts reinvigorates our museum exhibits.

planet_manager_awards.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的执行官与经理们竞相努力最大化商业协同效应，以达到关键的绩效目标。
planet_manager_awards.en_desc: Executives and Managers on this planet are competing to maximize business synergies and exceed key performance indicator goals.
planet_manager_awards.zhcn_modifier: £job_executive£ 执行官产出：§G+10%§!\n£job_manager£ 经理产出：§G+10%§!

planet_sanctuary_exhibits.zhcn_desc: 我们所有的活体陈设都在谈论外星文物展出一事。
planet_sanctuary_exhibits.en_desc: The display of alien artifacts is all our Bio-Trophies are talking about!

planet_artifact_relays_hivemind.zhcn_desc: 我们的突触工蜂正利用稀有文物来强化我们的低级子个体 。
planet_artifact_relays_hivemind.en_desc: Our Synapse Drones are using minor artifacts to enhance our Menial Drones.
planet_artifact_relays_hivemind.zhcn_modifier: 低级子个体产出：§R+0%§!每个星球上的 £job_synapse_drone£ §Y突触工蜂§!提供§G+1%§!低级子个体产出并提供§G+2§!稳定度。

planet_artifact_relays_machine.zhcn_desc: 我们的协调者正使用稀有文物来强化我们的低级子个体。
planet_artifact_relays_machine.en_desc: Our Coordinators are using minor artifacts to enhance our Menial Drones.
planet_artifact_relays_machine.zhcn_modifier: 低级子个体产出：§R+0%§!每个星球上的 £job_coordinator£ §Y协调者§!提供§G+1%§!低级子个体产出并提供§G+2§!稳定度。

lithoids_arc_site_minerals.zhcn_desc: 对考古遗址深入岩层的发掘使得行星上所有的矿物开采作业被迫中止。
lithoids_arc_site_minerals.en_desc: The excavation of an archaeological site within this world's mines is disrupting all planetside mining operations.

artifact_find_military_application_army.zhcn_desc: 你的士兵现在更强壮，更具有攻击性，更令人畏惧，但警惕性却有所下降。
artifact_find_military_application_army.en_desc: Your soldiers are stronger, more aggressive, and terrifying, but a bit less careful.
artifact_find_military_application_army.zhcn_modifier:
陆军士气：§G+5%§!
陆军伤害：§G+5%§!
陆军士气伤害：§G+10%§!
陆军连带伤害：§G+20%§!

artifact_find_military_application_army_.zhcn_desc: 舰队安全阈值的调整以潜在地损失些许命中率为代价来提高伤害。
artifact_find_military_application_army_.en_desc: Adjustments to the safety thresholds of your armies increases their damage potential at the cost of a minor loss in accuracy.
artifact_find_military_application_army_.zhcn_modifier: 陆军伤害：§G+5%§!\n陆军士气伤害：§G+5%§!\n陆军连带伤害：§G+10%§!

artifact_find_military_application_shiel.zhcn_desc: 你的舰船武器被调整为对护盾造成额外伤害。
artifact_find_military_application_shiel.en_desc: Your ship weapons are tuned to deal additional damage to shields.

artifact_find_military_application_armor.zhcn_desc: 你的舰船能通过利用敌舰的缺陷来对其装甲造成额外伤害。
artifact_find_military_application_armor.en_desc: Your ship weapons are able to exploit weaknesses, dealing additional damage to armor.

artifact_find_peaceful_application_happy.zhcn_desc: 对稀有文物的研究意外地在帝国境内快速掀起了一股潮流。每个帝国公民都参与其中。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_happy.en_desc: The study of minor artifacts has unexpectedly launched a viral fad across your Empire. Everybody's doing it.

artifact_find_peaceful_application_consu.zhcn_desc: 对稀有文物的研究让我们的生产效率得到了有效提高。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_consu.en_desc: Study of minor artifacts have yielded efficiency boosts to general manufacturing.

artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.zhcn_desc: 对稀有文物的研究，让我们的个人电子元件的电池尺寸减少了3%，它们现在变得比以前更加轻薄，并且生产成本更低。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.en_desc: Study of minor artifacts have yielded a 3% reduction in the battery size of personal electronics, allowing them to become thinner and cheaper to build than ever before!

artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.zhcn_desc: 我们对稀有文物的研究所揭示的技巧已被我们的维护工蜂所采用。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.en_desc: Our study of minor artifacts have uncovered techniques for our maintenance drones to exploit.

artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.zhcn_desc: 对稀有文物的研究，让我们的小型电子元件的电池尺寸减少了3%，提高了我们的效率。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_ameni.en_desc: Study of minor artifacts have yielded a 3% reduction in the battery size of small electronics, increasing our efficiency.

artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_desc: 对古老知识的学习以及团队建设活动使您的领袖更加富有洞察力。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.en_desc: Ancient lessons and team building exercises have provided new insights to your leaders.
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_modifier: 领袖经验获得：§G+10%§!\n信任度增长：§G+10%§!\n领袖维护费：§G-10%§!

artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_desc: 对稀有遗物的研究让我们能够强化我们自身的信息素，这使得领袖的工作变得更加容易。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.en_desc: Study of minor artifacts have allowed us to enhance our pheromones, making it easier to lead.
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_modifier: 领袖经验获得：§G+10%§!\n领袖维护费：§G-10%§!

artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_desc: 通过研究稀有文物，研究成果能够为我们对我们领袖的算法进行小幅度的升级。
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.en_desc: Study of minor artifacts have yielded slightly more efficient algorithms for our leaders.
artifact_find_peaceful_application_leade.zhcn_modifier: 领袖经验获得：§G+10%§!\n领袖维护费：§G-10%§!

relic_zro_crystal_state.zhcn_modifier: 稳定度：§G+5§!\n法令花费：§G-10%§!\n主流思潮吸引力：§G+25%§!

relic_defragmentor.zhcn_modifier: 每月能量币：§G+20%§!\n研究速度（£engineering£ 工程学）：§G+10%§!

javorian_pox.zhcn_desc: 舰队现在可以对星球采用§Y散布瘟疫§!作为轨道轰炸姿态。
javorian_pox.en_desc: Fleets can now use the §YPox§! Orbital Bombardment stance against planets.

reality_perforator_1.zhcn_desc: 你是否体验过真切到无法与真实分开的梦境？
reality_perforator_1.en_desc: Have you ever had a dream that you were so sure was real?

reality_perforator_2.zhcn_desc: 你是否体验过真切到无法与真实分开的梦境？
reality_perforator_2.en_desc: Have you ever had a dream that you were so sure was real?

reality_perforator_3.zhcn_desc: 你是否体验过真切到无法与真实分开的梦境？
reality_perforator_3.en_desc: Have you ever had a dream that you were so sure was real?

reality_perforator_4.zhcn_desc: 你是否体验过真切到无法与真实分开的梦境？
reality_perforator_4.en_desc: Have you ever had a dream that you were so sure was real?

artifact_irassian_research_completed.zhcn_desc: 伊瑞森的古老知识已为我们自身所用。
artifact_irassian_research_completed.en_desc: We have put the ancient knowledge of the Irassians to our own use.
artifact_irassian_research_completed.zhcn_modifier: 研究速度（生物学）：§G+15%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+5%§!

oracle_administration.zhcn_desc: 神谕让帝国像一台上好油的机器一样运作······当你给她上好了油时。
oracle_administration.en_desc: The Oracle operates the empire like a well-oiled machine... when you oil her.

chosen_of_zarqlan.zhcn_desc: 作为扎克兰的选民，我们可以安全地殖民圣地。
chosen_of_zarqlan.en_desc: As the chosen people of Zarqlan we can safely colonize Holy Worlds.

pm_yuht_cleansing.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星上大多数敌对野生动物已被武力清除。
pm_yuht_cleansing.en_desc: This planet was violently cleansed of most hostile wildlife.

artifact_cybrex_research_completed.zhcn_desc: 赛博勒克斯的古老知识已为我们所用。
artifact_cybrex_research_completed.en_desc: We have put the ancient knowledge of the Cybrex to our own use.

artifact_league_research_completed.zhcn_desc: 第一联盟的古老知识已为我们所用。
artifact_league_research_completed.en_desc: We have put the ancient knowledge of the First League to our own use.
artifact_league_research_completed.zhcn_modifier: 研究速度（工业）：§G+15%§!\n星球建造速度：§G+10%§!

artifact_vultaum_research_completed_supp.zhcn_desc: 沃陶姆的档案大大拓宽了我们对计算机领域的认知。我们学以致用，创造了人造虚拟世界造福大众。
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_supp.en_desc: The Vultaum archives have expanded our knowledge of computing considerably. We have used what we learned to create artificial virtual worlds for the enjoyment of all.
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_supp.zhcn_modifier: 研究速度（计算技术）：§G+15%§!\n舒适度：§G+10%§!

artifact_vultaum_research_completed_publ.zhcn_desc: 沃陶姆的档案表明我们生活在一个虚拟世界中。既然我们理解了我们的现实，我们应该可以利用特定的漏洞，通过它们来了解虚拟世界如何为我们带来便宜。
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_publ.en_desc: The Vultaum archives suggest that we live in a simulation. Now that we understand our reality, we can exploit certain loopholes to understand how it functions to our benefit.
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_publ.zhcn_modifier:
研究速度：§G+10%§!
研究速度（计算技术）：§G+15%§!
舒适度：§G+10%§!
幸福度：§R-20%§!

artifact_vultaum_research_completed_mach.zhcn_desc: 沃陶姆看上去在研究过程中采纳了一些不合逻辑的概念。他们在计算机以及虚拟世界领域的一些先进之处应该整合进我们的研究进程中。
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_mach.en_desc: The Vultaum appear to have accepted some fundamentally illogical concepts in their research. Their research into computing and virtual worlds had some advances that we shall incorporate into our own processes.
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_mach.zhcn_modifier: 研究速度（计算技术）：§G+15%§!\n人口组装速度：§G+5%§!

artifact_vultaum_research_completed_hive.zhcn_desc: 沃陶姆痴迷于现实和虚拟世界的概念。他们大多数发现对我们来说都毫无意义，但是至少他们对计算机的研究能够帮助我们。
artifact_vultaum_research_completed_hive.en_desc: The Vultaum obsessed over the concept of reality and of virtual worlds. Most of their findings are useless to us, but at least their research into computing will aid our own.

artifact_baol_research_completed.zhcn_desc: 巴奥的古老知识已为我们所用。
artifact_baol_research_completed.en_desc: We have put the ancient knowledge of the Baol to our own use.

artifact_zroni_research_completed.zhcn_desc: 泽珞族的古老知识已为我们所用。
artifact_zroni_research_completed.en_desc: We have put the ancient knowledge of the Zroni to our own use.

the_memorex.zhcn_desc: 眠梦仪强化学习项目能够在睡眠中对人口进行培训以使其符合帝国的需要，它能显著提升人口的产出。
the_memorex.en_desc: The Memorex Enhanced Learning Program trains the population to better fit the needs of the empire, as they sleep, improving their output significantly.
the_memorex.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的资源：§G+20%§!\n稳定度：§G+10§!

装甲值：§R-25%§!

护盾承受值：§R-75%§!

modern_trench_war.zhcn_desc: 在一颗曾被巨型蜗牛状生物包围的行星上的考古发现已经使我们对如何利用环境进行防护有了新颖而有效的洞见。这会提升我们的陆军对抗地面进攻时在防御战役中的生存率——即使是对抗巨型太空蛞蝓也不例外！
modern_trench_war.en_desc: Archaeological discoveries from a planet once besieged by gargantuan snail-like creatures has led to new and effective insight on how to utilise the environment for protection. This will improve the survivability of our armies in defensive combat against all ground assaults - even from giant space slugs!

forced_mindfulness.zhcn_desc: 在被困在一个致命的、充满熔岩的迷宫中时，我们的考古团队制定了一个例行的心灵放松程序。这项实践的基本原则现已在整个帝国广为人知。
forced_mindfulness.en_desc: During their time trapped in a deadly, lava-filled maze, our archaeology team developed a routine of mindful relaxation. The fundamental principles of this exercise is now commonly known throughout the empire.

debug_subroutine.zhcn_desc: 当被暂时孤立在充满熔岩的迷宫中时，我们的考古单位与网络断开，无法执行其功能。他们开发了一种算法，允许他们在睡眠模式下运行调试子例程。此子例程后来已被上载并增补入主系统中。
debug_subroutine.en_desc: While temporarily isolated in a maze full of lava, our archaeology units were disconnected from the network and unable to perform their function. They developed an algorithm that allowed them to run a debug subroutine while in sleep mode. This subroutine was later uploaded and patched in to the main system.

glory_to_the_many.zhcn_desc: 一支探险队在充满熔岩的迷宫中被困，暂时与蜂巢思维失去了联系。不能依靠集体意识，他们经历了与糟糕的自我概念的短暂遭遇；这是一次恐怖的经历，只会加强对个人主义的蔑视。
glory_to_the_many.en_desc: An expedition marooned inside a maze full of lava temporarily lost touch with the Hive Mind. Unable to rely on the collective consciousness they suffered a brief encounter with the dreaded notion of Self; a terrifying experience that only strengthened the contempt for individualism.

anthem_of_aurora.zhcn_desc: 科学部门已成功重现了曾遭遇过的北极光实体所“吟唱”的空灵赞美诗。所有能源生产设施现在都有谐波系统以增加产量。
anthem_of_aurora.en_desc: The science division has managed to reproduce the ethereal hymn "sung" by an encountered aurora borealis entity. All Energy production facilities now have harmonics systems that amplifies the yield.
